A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ?
Sokre: A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ?
Leokre: Neb nĩns sen kɩɩsd t’a Zezi ka Wẽnnaama rãmb gomdame t’A meng zɩ n yeel t’B yaa Wẽnnaam ye. Yaa sɩd tɩ Wẽnnaam sebrã ka gʋls t’a Zezi yiisa goam n yeel tɩ, “ Mam yaa Wẽnnaam” ye. La rẽ ka wiligdi, t’a Zezi zɩ n yeel t’A yaa Wẽnnam way.
A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ?— A Zezi meng zoe n yeelame t’B yaa Wẽnnaam.
D sãn dɩk makr ne a Zezi goamã Zã 10:30, “Ma
... (1082 chars skipped) ... 
a, bɩ y gûus y mens ne piis nins fãa Sɩɩg-sõng sen kõ yãmbã, la y rɩlg Zusoabã tẽedbã bãmb sen da ne bãmb mengã zɩɩmã.” Anna n da wẽn-doogã ne a meng zɩɩm? A Zezi Kirist. Verse-kãng leb n yeelame tɩ Wẽnnaam ra B wẽnd-doogã ne b meng zɩɩm. Woto yĩnga, a zezi yaa Wẽnnaam.
A Zezi Karem-biig a Toma yeela Zezi yaa, “Mam Zusoab la mam Wẽnnaam” (Zã 20:28). A Zezi ka kɩɩs-a ye. Tɩt 2:13 keoogda tõnd tɩ d gũ d Zusoabã la d Wẽnnaamã waoongo, a Zezi Kirist (ges-y 2 Piyɛɛre 1:1). Hebre 1:8, Ba wã yeel a Zez
... (1082 chars skipped) ...
e n deeg dũniyã fãa yel-wẽna (2 Korẽntiyẽ rãmba 5:21), n ki, la B vʋʋge, n wilig tɩ Bãmb toga yel-wẽnã ne kũumã.
A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam bɩ? N-ye. A Zezi meng yeelame t’A yaaWẽnnaam. A tũudbã tẽeme t’B yaa Wẽnnaam. Fãagrã kũun yaa bũmb sen yaa vẽenega sãn mikame t’a Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam. A Zezi yaa Wẽnnaam sen dɩk yĩnga, sen Ka-saab sen yaa Alfa la Omɛga wã (wiligr 1:8; 22:13), la yaa tõnd Wẽnnaam la tõnd Fãagda (2 Pɩyɛɛre 1:1).
English

Morã legsa sogsg sẽn kẽẽd ne yel lanins sẽn watã: kũum yela, la faado, la pʋʋsgo, la sallem ningri, la noloere, la laas zãabo, la tuubgu, la semineer damba yelle, la biig hake sẽn be a baaba zugu, la lihlaamba mininga, la sɩgar yũubu, la bãng kẽebo, la bi-kɩdg kũum pʋʋsgo, la zɩt sõng t’a gʋʋl kukuiba
- Moore
B kõo vẽenem yel lanins sẽn watã zugu: 1- Semineer ramba bʋʋdo 2- Pʋʋs Ahmadɩya maa sɩɩ’a ned poorẽ bʋʋdo 3- Lihlaam pok sẽn na n fur mompeer bʋʋdo 4- Lihlaam pok sẽn na n fur pʋʋs-bahd bʋʋdo 5- Ra-saar tikr hutb pʋgẽ bʋʋdo 6- Fagir laandãan bog la naoongã sẽn be wã 7- Pagb laandãan bʋʋdo 8- Yals limaam taor n pʋʋs bʋʋdo 9- Yalla kũum tõe pʋʋs n yɩlmame bɩɩ

A Zezi karen-biig n da kos-a woto: “Zu-soaba, bɩ y zãms tõnd pʋʋsgo.” (Luk 11:1) A Zezi leoorã pʋgẽ, a rɩka makr a yiib n na n wilg tõnd d sẽn segd n pʋʋs to-to tɩ Wẽnnaam kelg-do. Y sã n zoe n soka y meng Wẽnnaam sã n kelgda y pʋʋsg bɩ a pa kelgde, a Zezi sẽn leok a karen-biisã n yeel bũmb ningã tõe n sõng-y lame.—Karm-y Luk 11:5-13.
Pipi makrã wilgda sẽn pʋʋsd-a wã manesem sẽn segd n yɩ to-to. (Luk 11:5-8) Kibarã gomda rao sẽn paam sãan yʋn-sʋk yelle. A ra pa tar dɩɩb n na n kõ-a, tɩ ra pak-a.
... (506 chars skipped) ... 
ẽn pʋʋsd-a ne tẽebã, n kõt-b bũmb nins b sẽn kotã. D sã n pẽdgd ne kosgo, d wilgdame tɩ d sɩd rata bũmb ning d sẽn kotã, la tɩ d kɩsa sɩd tɩ sã n zems ne Wẽnnaam daabã, a na n kõ-d lame.—Mark 11:24; 1 Zã 5:14.
Makr a yiib-n-soabã gomda sẽn ‘wʋmd-a pʋʋsgã’ yelle. (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 65:3) A Zezi soka woto: “Ãnda n be yãmb sʋka, a biig sẽn na n kos-a bur t’a rɩk kugr n kõ-a? Wall a sã n kos-a zĩunfu, a na rɩk waaf n kõ-a n ka kõ-a zĩunf bɩ? Wall a sã n kos-a gelle, a na rɩk nang n kõ-a bɩ?” Leoorã yaa vẽ
... (506 chars skipped) ...
yaa tɩlae ne-ba. Rẽnd sẽn tũud-b a Zeova wã tõe n kos-a-la bũmb nins b sẽn date. Sẽn paase, b miime t’a kõt-b-la bõn-sõma. Rẽnd a sẽn leok-b to-to fãa, b sũur yaa noogo, baa a sẽn kõ-bã sã n pa b sẽn datã takɩ. *
^ sull 4 Makrã bilgda bũmb zʋɩf-rãmbã sẽn da minim n maandẽ. Sã n yaa ne bãmba, sãan deegr pa reem bũmb ye. Sẽn paase, zagsã rãmb da maanda burã sẽn na sek-b daarã tõre. Rẽnd sã n mi n paooge, b tõe n tɩ penga zĩig a to. Zak rãmb nug sã n da pa zãad me, b naagda taab ro-yɛng pʋgẽ n gãe.

Betɛllã zak rãmb tʋmda tʋʋm toor-toor sẽn na yɩl tɩ koɛɛgã mooneg kẽng taoor b tẽngẽ wã, bɩ tẽns a taab me pʋsẽ. Neb kẽer lebgda sɛba, tɩ neb a taab yiisdẽ, tɩ sãnda ningd kartõ rãmb pʋsẽ, tɩ kẽer me get sɛbã bĩngr yelle, tɩ sãnda maand CD la video rãmba, tɩ kẽer me tʋmd tʋʋm a taaba.
Betɛll fãa tara sull sẽn get a tʋʋmã yelle. Betɛll fãa pʋgẽ, Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sull yãkda kãsem-dãmb a tã bɩ sẽn yɩɩd rẽ, tɩ b get tʋʋm nins b sẽn tʋmd b tẽngẽ wã bɩ tẽns a taab pʋsẽ wã yelle. Nin-kãensã gʋlsda Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sullã n wilgd-b tʋʋmdã sẽn kẽngd taoor to-to, tɩ yell sã n beẽ me bɩ b togs-ba. Woto sõngda Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sullã, tɩ b bãngd b sẽn na n gom bũmb nins yell sɛbã pʋsẽ, bɩ tigissã la tigis-kãsemsã sasa. Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sull yãkda ned t’a kaagd Betɛll dãmbã, n kõt sull ning sẽn get tʋʋmã yellã sagls sẽn sõngd-b tɩ b tʋmd b tʋʋmã neere. (Yelbũna 11:14) Betɛll kaagr sasa, tẽngã saam-biisã tigimda taaba, tɩ kaagdã sõs ne-b n keng b raoodo.
B sõngda tigimsã. B sã n na n lugl tiginga, sull ning sẽn get Betɛllã yellã n kõt sore. Bãmb me n get b babgẽ so-pakdbã, misioneer dãmbã la tigims sul yel-gɛtbã yelle. Leb n yaa bãmb n get tigis-kãsemsã siglg la Rĩungã rot meeb yelle, la b getẽ me tɩ tigimsã paamd sɛb la bũmb nins fãa sẽn yaa tɩlae wã. Tʋʋm nins fãa b sẽn tʋmd Betɛllẽ wã sõngdame tɩ koɛɛgã mooneg yɩ wa sẽn segdã.—1 Korẽnt dãmba 14:33, 40.
Wãn to la Betɛll dãmbã yel-gɛtbã sõngd Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb Sulli?
Bõe tʋʋmd la b tʋmd Betɛll dãmbẽ wã?

Sã n yaa ne yãmba, Biiblã . . .
yaa ninsaalb n tags n gʋls bɩ?
yaa soalem sebr bɩ?
bɩ a yaa Wẽnnaam sebre?
BIIBLÃ SẼN YETE
“Sebr sõngã zãng yii Wẽnnaam nengẽ.”—2 Tɩmote 3:16, Sebr Sõngo.
RẼ SẼN TÕE N NAF-Y TO-TO
Biiblã leokda sogsg sẽn tar yõod wʋsg ne ãdem-biig fãa.—Yelbũna 2:1-5.
A kõta sagl-sõma vɩɩmã nens fãa pʋgẽ.—Yɩɩl Sõamyã 119:105.
A kɩtdame tɩ d tõe n tẽ tɩ manegr n wate.—Rom dãmba 15:4.
D TÕE N TẼE BIIBLÃ SẼN YETÃ BI?
N-ye. Ad bʋʋm a tãabo:
A goamã sẽn pa kɩɩsd taabã yaa bõn-kãsenga. Yaa na maan neb 40 n gʋls Biiblã. B rɩka sẽn yɩɩd yʋʋm 1600 n gʋls-a. A gʋlsdbã wʋsg pa bãng taab meng ye. La ne rẽ fãa, a sɩngrẽ wã n tɩ ta a baasgã, a goamã fãa tũuda taaba!
Biiblã sẽn togs kʋdem-wẽndẽ yɛl ninsã yaa sɩda. Kʋdemd yɛl-mitbã sɛbẽ, b wae n solgda b buudã neb kongre. La Biiblã gʋlsdb yẽ sak n wilga bãmb mensã la b buudã kongre.—2 Kibaya 36:15, 16; Yɩɩl Sõamyã 51:3-6.
A bãngr-goamã pidsdame. Yʋʋm 200 nand tɩ b sãam Babilonne, no-rɛɛs a Ezai togsame tɩ b na n wa sãam-a lame. (Ezai 13:17-22) A Ezai togsa b sẽn na n tõog Babilon to-to wã, la a wilg naab ning sẽn na n deeg tẽngã yʋʋr menga.—Ezai 45:1-3.
Biiblã bãngr-goam wʋsg me zoe n pidsa ball-balle. Rẽ yĩnga woto pa wilgd t’a yaa sebr sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ sɩda?—2 Pɩɛɛr 1:21.
AD SOKRE:
Wãn to la Wẽnnaam Gomdã tõe n maneg yãmba?
Biiblã leokda sok-kãngã EZAI 48:17, 18 la 2 TƖMOTE 3:16, 17 wã pʋgẽ.

“Bɩ y togs tõnd . . . bãnd ning sẽn na n wilg yãmb waoongo, la dũniyã sɛɛb wakate.”—MAT. 24:3.
1. Bõe la tʋm-tʋmdbã ra rat n bãng tɩ tõnd me rat n bãnge?
A ZEZI tẽng zug tʋʋmdã ra kolga sɛɛbo, t’a karen-biisã ra rat ne b sũy fãa n bãng bũmb nins sẽn na n zĩnd beoog-daarã. Rẽ n so tɩ rasem a wãn nand t’a ki, bãmb b naas kos-a woto: “Bɩ y togs tõnd bõn-kãens sẽn na n zĩnd wakat ninga, la bãnd ning sẽn na n wilg yãmb waoongo, la dũniyã sɛɛb wakate.” (Mat. 24:3; Mark 13:3) A Zezi leokrã pʋgẽ, a togs
... (5519 chars skipped) ... 
zugu.” Gũusg Gasgã wilgame t’a Zezi lebga Wẽnnaam Rĩungã rĩm yʋʋmd 1914, la a pa ‘zaoond a naam geerã zug’ n na n kao “buudã fãa” bʋʋd ye. (Mat. 25:32; ges-y Daniɛll 7:13.) La yel-bũnd ning sẽn gomd piisã ne bʋʋsã welgr yellã pʋgẽ, a Zezi gomda yẽ sẽn na n kao bʋʋdã yelle. (Karm-y Matɩe 25:31-34, 41, 46.) Sẽn mik t’a Zezi pa sɩng buudã fãa bʋʋd kaoob yʋʋmd 1914, rẽnd pa yʋʋm-kãng la a sɩng ninsaalbã welgr wa pe-kɩɩm sẽn welgd a piis ne a bʋʋs ye. (Ges-y vẽnegr a 3.) La yaa wakat bʋg la bʋ-kaoorã
... (5519 chars skipped) ...
kiuug pipi daar Gũusg Gasgã seb-neng a 8-20.
Sull a 8: Matɩe 24:31 yeelame tɩ b na n ‘tigsa nin-tũusdsã.’ Dẽnd wõnda yaa to-kãsengã sɩngr poor la sẽn paam-b vʋʋsem sõngã zaeeb n ket tẽngã zugã na n kẽng saasẽ, tɩ Armagedõ nan pa sɩng ye. Woto yaa toor ne d sẽn da yeel bũmb ning yʋʋmd 1990 sa-sik kiuug rasem 15 Gũusg Gasgã seb-neng 30 wã, sõsg ning gom-zug sẽn yaa “ Questions des lecteurs. ”
Sull 11: Ges-y yʋʋmd 1995 zĩ-likr kiuug rasem 15 Gũusg Gasgã seb-neng 18-28.
Sull 12: Karm-y Luk 21:28 me.

1. Bõe yĩng tɩ d segd n bao n bãng bũmb kẽer malɛgsã zugu?
A ZEOVA ratame tɩ d bãng a zakã neba. Malɛgsã yaa Wẽnnaam zakã neba. Biiblã pʋgẽ, b boond-b lame tɩ “Wẽnnaam kom-dibli.” (Zoob 38:

gda ne bũmb a taab me n bẽt nebã. Yaa b sẽn kɩt tɩ nebã tẽed tɩ b tõe n sõng-b lame tɩ b bãng sẽn wat beoogo, wall bũmb sẽn solgã. Rẽ n so tɩ neb kẽer bʋgd bagre, n wẽed bĩisri, wall b wilgd zãmsd võorã. Sãnda me geta ãdse, wall nug-pʋg gʋlsem. Neb wʋsg tagsdame tɩ woto fãa pa wẽng ye. La pa sɩd ye. Yaa yell menga. ” (Efɛɛs-rãmbã 6:
18, 19. a) Bõe la d segd n maan n tõog zabr ning d sẽn tar ne a Sʋɩtãan la ne a zĩn-dãmbã? b) Sok-bʋg la d na n leok sak ning sẽn pʋgdã pʋgẽ?
18 D sã n sãam bũmb ning fãa d sẽn tar n maand zĩn-dãmb yɛlã, la d teeg a Zeova sẽn na yɩl t’a kogl-do, a Sʋɩtãan ne a zĩn-dãmbã pa na n tõog-d ye. D pa segd n zoe-b ye. (Karm-y Zak 4:
19 La sẽn mik t’a Sʋɩtãan ne zĩn-dãmbã kɩtame tɩ ninsaalbã namsd wʋsgã, bõe yĩng tɩ Wẽnnaam nan pa sãam-ba? D na n leoka sok-kãngã sak ning sẽn pʋgdã pʋgẽ.

Daar a ye, a Awa ra yaa a yembre, tɩ waaf wa gom ne-a. Waafã yeel-a lame yaa: ‘Yaa sɩd tɩ Wẽnnaam pa rat tɩ y rɩ tɩɩsã fãa biis bɩ?’ T’a Awa leok yaa: ‘Tõnd tõe n dɩɩ tɩɩsã fãa biisi, sã n pa a ye bala. Tõnd sã n dɩ tɩ-kãng bilã, d na n kiime.’ La waafã yeel-a lame yaa: ‘Yãmb pa na n ki ye. Fo miime, yãmb sã n dɩ, y na n lebga wa Wẽnnaam.’ Waafã sẽn yeelã yaa sɩd bɩ? Ayo, yaa ziri. La a Awa ra tẽedame tɩ yaa sɩda. A sẽn da tar tɩɩgã bil gesgã, yamleoogã kẽ-a lame, t’a yãk n dɩ, la a tɩ kõ a Ãdem me. A Ãdem ra miime tɩ b sã n kɩɩs Wẽnnaam, b na n kiime. La baa ne rẽ, a rɩɩme.
Baraar zaabre, a Zeova goma ne a Ãdem la a Awa. A sok-b lame tɩ bõe yĩng tɩ b kɩɩs yẽ. A Awa yeelame tɩ yaa waafã n belg yẽ, t’a Ãdem yeel tɩ yaa a Awa n kõ yẽ. B sẽn kɩɩs a Zeova wã, a rig-b lame n yiis Edɛn zẽedã zĩigẽ. Sẽn na yɩl tɩ b ra le tõog n kẽ, a Zeova kɩtame tɩ malɛgs wa yals noorẽ wã, la a kɩt tɩ sʋʋg sẽn wit bugum me be be n yilimdẽ.
A Zeova yeelame t’a na n sɩbga sẽn belg-a a Awa wã. Pa waaf n sɩd ra gomd ne a Awa ye. A Zeova pa maan waaf t’a tõe n gom ye. Yaa malɛg-wẽng n da kɩt tɩ waafã gomda. A maana woto n na n belg a Awa. Malɛg-kãng yʋʋr la a Sʋɩtãana. Ka la bilfu, a Zeova na n sãama a Sʋɩtãana, t’a ra le belg nebã tɩ b maan sẽn yaa wẽng ye.

Yaa kiuug a ye tõre, la Burkĩna Faso moeembã ra be ko-yũud pʋgẽ, la sẽoog kiuug rasem a 4 yʋʋm 2019 soabã noorã lokame. Rõanda yʋʋmdã, b pʋʋsgã gom-zug yaa nin-buiidã na lagem taab n vɩɩmde, ma biir la saam-biir pʋgẽ, tɩ dĩin-dãmbã zems-n-taar ne taab kẽng taoore. Pʋʋsgã maana Waogdgo “palaas de la nasẽo”. […]

GES-Y rao ning sẽn be koomã pʋgẽ wã. Yell n na n paam-a, bala zĩnfã rat n vel-a lame. Yãmb mii raoã bɩ? A yʋʋr la a Zonase. Bɩ d ges bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a wa be koomã pʋgẽ wã.

Koɛɛgã mooneg sasa, d sã n wẽ kʋɩleng tɩ biig pake, d tog n sok-a-la a roagdbã sã n beeme. Woto wilgdame tɩ d nanda b zu-sobendã. (Yel. 6:20) Biigã sã n yeel tɩ d kẽ, d pa tog n sak ye. A roagdbã sã n pa tar sẽk bɩ b sã n yiime, d tog n lebg n waa wakat a to.
Baa biigã yʋʋm sã n taa 15 n digd 19, d tog n soka a roagdbã sã n beeme. B sã n ka be bɩ b pa tar sẽka, d tõe n sok-a lame n ges a roagdbã sã n kõ-a-la sor t’a tõe n deeg sebr n yõd n karme. A sã n tara sore, bɩ d kõ-a sebr wall d wilg-a tõnd sitã sẽn yaa jw.org.
D sã n lebg n na n tɩ kaag biig sẽn yeel t’a rat n bãng n paasame, d tog n soka a roagdbã yelle, n bao n sõs ne-ba. Rẽ d paamd n wilg-b-la d waoongã võore, la d wilg-b me tɩ Biiblã tara sagls sẽn tõe n sõng zak rãmba. (Yɩɩn. 119:86, 138) D sã n wilg tɩ d waoogda biigã roagdba, na n kɩtame tɩ b pẽg-do, tõeeme me n kõ-d weer tɩ d tõog n moon zakã nebã koɛɛgã.—1 Pɩy. 2:12.

Hay Festival of Literature & Arts, b sẽn boond tɩ Hay Festival (Welsh), yaa sɛb kibs sẽn maand yʋʋm fãa Hay-on-Wye, Powys, Wales, rasem 10 sigr kiuug n tãag sigr kiuugã. A Norman, a Rhoda la a Peter Florence n sɩng kibsã yʋʋmd 1988 wã, la a Bill Clinton yeelame tɩ yaa " Woodstock ning sẽn get yam yelle. " [1] A Tony Benn yeela woto: "Mam yamẽ wã, a rɩka Nowɛll zĩigẽ".[2]
A lebga kibs sẽn tar yõod wʋsg Britani wã pʋgẽ, la b gʋlsa tigs nins sẽn zĩnd kibsã pʋgẽ wã televiziõ la radio wã tʋʋm-noy wala a The Readers' and Writers' Roadshow la a The One Show. BBC wã radio rãmb fãa sẽn be tẽng fãa pʋgẽ n ka naag ne Radio One wã ra tara tʋʋm sẽn kẽed ne kibsã, la Sky Arts wilga kibsã yɛl nins sẽn yɩ kãsenga yʋʋm 2010 n tãag 2013, n dɩk pipi kibsã kibsã n kõ BBC yʋʋm 2014 soabã.[3]

1Na'ayenɛ, mam zɛnkɛ la hom. Se'ere zuo, hom n foe mam na, ge ka bahɛ te n diŋdoma yɛɛm bahɛ n zuo wa. 2Na'ayenɛ mam Yenɛ wa, mam kaahɛ bo la hom ɛɛra soŋorɛ, te ho lebehe mam. 3Na'ayenɛ, hom n foe mam potɛn'ɛrɛ kum poan, ge bo mam vom te n bɔna la vɔpa wa. 4Yamam sɛba n tare sakerɛ sera la Na'ayenɛ wa, yoon ya pɛngɛ en, ge dekɛ ya po'ohegɔ bo a fa'a yu'urɛ la. 5Se'ere n sɔe la, a sunsunya ka nyuunre, ge te ninbɔn'zɔrɛ la ton bɔna bala yɛ'ɛha. Kɛlega ta'an kele yu'uŋɔ, ge beere yelegere mɛ la nyeema. 6Han dɛna mam, mam ze'ele la n panrega wa poan yeti, sɛla kan daam mam. 7Hom Na'ayenɛ n de ninbɔn'zɔta la zuo, ho sɛ' mam la zoore n kpe'em zuo. Hom sogɛ ho nɛŋa la, bahɛ te mam suunre n sagom. 8Mam yi' la hom Na'ayenɛ. Mam kaahɛ to ho zɔ' mam ninbɔn'ɔn. 9Mam han ki, mam han sige yɔɔ poan, bene nyonrɔ n boe bini? Ke'endoma me pɛngere hom Na'ayenɛ me yoi? Kum wan nyaŋɛ pa'alɛ hom n de birikina Na'ayenɛ se'em me la yoi? 10Na'ayenɛ, kelehe mam, ge zo'ohɛ mam. Na'ayenɛ dɛna mam soŋora. 11Hom m bahɛ te mam nintam wa lebege wa'a. Hom n yɛɛ mam sunsagaŋɔ futo, ge bo mam nyeema, 12te mam suunre nyaŋɛ pɛngera hɔ, ge ya sina. Na'ayenɛ wa n de mam Yenɛ wa, mam wan pɛngɛ ho nananawa kɔ'ɔn yɛ'ɛha.

Rasem a tãab a Zezi kũumã poore, pagb n kẽng yaoogẽ wã n tɩ mik tɩ yaa vɩʋʋgo. A Zeova vʋʋga a Zezi.
A Zezi vʋʋgrã poore, a puka a meng t’a tʋm-tʋmdbã yã-a.
A Zeova vʋʋga a Zezi t’a le lebg malɛk sẽn tar tõog wʋsgo, n pa na n tol n ki ye. A Zezi karen-biisã yã-a-la a sẽn wa n dʋʋd saasẽ wã.
Wẽnnaam vʋʋga a Zezi n kɩt t’a lebg a Rĩungã rĩma. Daniɛll 7:13, 14
A Zezi sak n kiime tɩ yɩ rond ãdem-biisã yĩnga. (Matɩe 20:28) Rondã yĩnga, Wẽnnaam sakame tɩ tõnd tõe n wa vɩɩmd wakat sẽn kõn sa.
A Zeova kɩtame t’a Zezi lebg rĩma, n na n dɩ naam tẽngã gill zugu. Wẽn-sakdb 144000 la b na n vʋʋg tɩ b kẽng saasẽ. Yaa a Zezi ne nin-kãensã 144000 n na n naag taab n dɩ naam Wẽnnaam Rĩungã sẽn yaa tɩrlem goosneemã pʋgẽ.—Wilgri 14:1-3.
Wẽnnaam Rĩungã na n kɩtame tɩ tẽngã lebg arzãna. Zabã, tʋʋm-beed toor-toorã, naongã la komã na n saame. Nebã na n paama sũ-noog hakɩka.—Yɩɩl Sõamyã 145:16.

Tõnd nin-sabls tẽnsẽ, la dũni wen-vʋɩɩs a naasã pʋgẽ, sẽn gʋlsdb seb-karemdsã ne b buudã goama ra tara ninbãaneg wʋsgo, b sɛbã na tõog n yit wakat fãa . Yaa rẽ tɩ wao-fugdg kiuug rasem 18 n ta a rasem 21 yʋʋm 2019 soabã, ãndũni wã sull kaseng ning sẽn get buudã goam sɛb yiisg yelle, tɩ b kʋʋg koɛɛg n boond « ADEA » la « USAID » tʋmd-n-taar yĩnga, b kõo buudã goam seb-gʋndb zãmsgo. Yaa ne nasaara nug-tʋʋm-te-paalle, b sẽn boond tɩ Buluma « Bloom » zãmsgo.
Bulum yaa tʋʋmd teoogo, b sẽn tara n maan
... (2564 chars skipped) ... 
oog n yãag-ba. Sẽn wa n na n baase, mise Aliu Sow sẽn ges zãmsgã yell pẽga tʋʋmdã, la a wilg t’a na n maoome n dɩk zãmsdbã kosg n taas taoor rãmbã. Wẽnd na kell n yãag neb nins sẽn maod ne buudã goam na piuugã, tɩ b raabã paam pidisgu. Pẽgdwẽnde Erik Zĩnaaba
Les écrivains en langues nationales ont bénéficié d’une formation sur le logiciel Bloom
En Afrique et dans le monde entier, les écrivains en langues nationales rencontraient d’énormes difficultés pour la parution de leurs oeuvres. C’est ains
... (2564 chars skipped) ...
tenir une attestation de participation. C’est par la remise de ces attestations que la formation a pris fin. Les participants ont montré leur satisfaction et ils ont demandé au Gouvernement de les accompagner dans la promotion des langues nationales. Monsieur Aliou Sow qui a été le formateur a aussi montré sa satisfaction et a promis de transmettre les doléances des participants à qui de droit. Que Dieu accompagne les promoteurs qui œuvrent pour l’émergence des langues nationales.
P Eric Zinaaba

Bãmb na n yɩɩ Wẽnnaam nebã, la Wẽnnaam mengã na n paa ne bãmba. Wẽnnaam na n yẽesa nintãm fãa sẽn be b ninẽ wã. Kũum kõn leb n zĩnd ye, la sũ-sãang wall yãbre, wall toog kõn leb n zĩnd ye. Bala, dẽenem bũmbã fãa loogame.”—Vẽnegre 21:3, 4.

A Karl Rahner ne a Herbert Vorgrimler sẽn yaa Katolik tũudmã bãngdb yeelame tɩ “yaa tɩlae tɩ f paam tɩ Wẽnnaam meng vẽneg-fo, tɩ f tõog n bãng t’a yaa mens a tãabo. La baa f paam vẽnegr me, yɩl n wʋm a võor yaa toogo.” Yãmb sã n pa tol n tõe n bãng neda, wall n wʋm a sẽn maand võore, y tõe n non

og ye. A ratame tɩ d bãng-a. Sɩd me, nebã tõe n bãng-a lame. A Zezi ra yeela woto: “Tõnd . . . waoogda tõnd sẽn mi.”—Zã 4:22.
A Marco paasa woto: “M sẽn wa n bãng tɩ vʋʋsem sõngã ne a Zezi la Wẽnnaam pa naag taab n yaa mens a tãabã, sõnga maam tɩ m tõog n yõg zood ne Wẽnnaam mengã.” D sã n miẽ t’a Zeova yaa a ye tãa, la t’a pa wa yel-solemd b sẽn pa tõe n wʋm a võore, na n yɩɩ nana tɩ d nong-a. Biiblã yetame: “Ned ninga sẽn ka tar nonglem ka mi Wẽnnaam ye, tɩ bõe, Wẽnnaam yaa nonglem.”—1 Zã 4:8.

Biiblã sẽn yete
Wẽnnaam daabã yaa y bao n bãng-a, n bao a zoodo, n nong-a la y tũud-a ne y sũur fãa. (Matye 22:37, 38; Zak 4:8) A Zeezi sẽn vɩɩmd to-to wã n paas a sẽn zãms nebã bũmb ninsã tõe n sõng-y lame tɩ y bãng y sẽn tõe n maan Wẽnnaam daabã to-to. (Zã 7:16, 17) A Zeezi ra pa gomd Wẽnnaam daabã yell bal ye. A maana Wẽnnaam daabã. Sɩd me, a yeelame tɩ yẽ pa wa n na n ‘maan a sẽn dat ye, la yaa sẽn na n maan sẽn tʋm-a yẽ wã raabo.
’—Zã 6:38.
Yaa tɩlɛ tɩ m paam bãnde, vẽnegr bɩ bũmb a to sẽn yit Wẽnnaam nengẽ n yaool n bãng Wẽnnaam sẽn dat tɩ m maan bũmb ning bɩ?
Ayo. Bala koɛɛg ning Wẽnnaam sẽn taas ninsaalbã bee Biiblã pʋgẽ. A tara bũmb nins y sẽn dat sẽn na yɩl n “seglg tɩ maan tʋʋm-sõamy buud fãa
” wã. (2 Tɩmote 3:16, 17) Wẽnnaam datame tɩ y karem Biiblã la y tags ne y yamã n bãng a sẽn dat tɩ y maan bũmb ningã.—Rom-dãmbã 12:1, 2; Efɛɛs-rãmbã 5:17.
Mam sɩd tõe n maana Wẽnnaam daabã bɩ?
N-ye. Y tõeeme. Bala Biiblã yetame tɩ Wẽnnaam “tõodã ka toog
” ne tõnd ye. (1 Zã 5:3) Woto pa rat n yeel tɩ Wẽnnaam noyã sakr yaa nana wakat fãa ye. La bark ning y sẽn na n paamã na n yɩɩga y modgrã hal zĩig sẽn zãre. A Zeezi mengã yeelame: “Yaa neb nins sẽn kelgd Wẽnnaam goamã n sakdẽ wã n tar barka.
”—Luk 11:28.

Wẽnnaam a Zeova n yaa tõnd Naanda. Yẽ n naan bũmb nins fãa tõnd sẽn ne la d sẽn pa ne wã. Nand t’a naan bũmb nins tõnd ninã sẽn ne wã, a reng n naana malɛgs wʋsgo. Fo mii malɛgsã sẽn yaa to-to bɩ? B yaa wa a Zeova. Wa tõnd sẽn pa tõe n yãnd a Zeova wã, d pa tõe n yãnd malɛgsã me ye. Pipi malɛkã a Zeova sẽn naanã sõng-a lame t’a maan ãdsã, kiuugã, wĩntoogã la bũmb a taabã fãa. Wala makre, b naana tẽngã tɩ yaa neere, tõnd yĩnga.
A Zeova manega tẽngã tɩ ninsaalbã la rũmsã tõe n zĩnd be. A kɩtame tɩ wĩntoogã vẽenem tat tẽngã zugu. A maana tãmsã, ko-kãsemsã la kʋɩlsã.
Bõe la a Zeova maan rẽ poore? A yeelame: ‘M na n maana mood ne tɩɩs sẽn womd biisi.’ Moodã, tɩɩsã ne fɩlɛɛr-dãmbã sɩd yiime. Rẽ poore, a Zeova maana rũmsã fãa. Kẽer yɩgdame tɩ sãnda vũnumdẽ, tɩ kẽer me be koomã pʋgẽ. A maana kẽer tɩ b yaa kɩdse, wala makre yõensã, tɩ kẽer me yaa bɛda, wala makre wobdã. Rũmsã fãa sʋka, bʋg la fo nonga?
A Zeova yeela malɛk ning a sẽn naan pipi wã yaa: ‘D maan ninsaala.’ Ninsaalbã yaa toor ne rũmsã. B tõe n maana bũmb wʋsgo. B tõe n laame, n gome, la b pʋʋse. Bãmb n da na n ges tẽngã la rũmsã yelle. Fo mii rao ning a Zeova sẽn naan pipi wã yʋʋr bɩ? Tõnd na n yãa rẽ taoore.
“Sɩngr wẽndẽ, Wẽnnaam naana yĩngr la tẽngã.”—Sɩngre 1:1

A ZEZI yalsa Samari bulg noor n na n vʋʋse. A karen-biisã kẽe tẽngã pʋgẽ n na n bao rɩɩbo. Pag ning a Zezi sẽn gomd ne wã waame n na n wi koom. A Zezi yeela pagã yaa: ‘M kota koom n na n yũ.’
La linga pagã wʋsgo. Yãmb mii sẽn yaa bũmb ning yĩng bɩ? Yaa a Zezi sẽn yaa Zʋɩf tɩ yẽ yaa Samari nedã yĩnga. Zʋɩf rãmbã ra kisa Samari nebã. B ra pʋd n pa gomd ne-b meng ye. La a Zezi nonga nebã fãa. A yeela pagã yaa: ‘Fo sã n da mi ned ninga sẽn yet foo tɩ f kõ-a koom t’a yũ wã, fo ra na n kosa yẽ t’a kõ-

a lame yaa: ‘Fo sã n yũ bul-kãngã koom, ko-yũud na n le yõka foo. La ned sã n yũ koom ningã mam sẽn na n kõ yẽ wã, a tõe n kɩtame t’a soab vɩɩmd wakat sẽn ka sate.’
Tɩ pagã yeel a Zezi yaa: ‘M kẽema, bɩ y kõ maam ko-kãng tɩ m yũ, tɩ ko-yũud ra le tol n yõk-ma, la m da le wat n wiid koom ka ye.’
Pagã ra tẽedame t’a Zezi gomda koom sɩd-sɩd yelle. La a Zezi ra gomda Wẽnnaam ne a rĩungã bãngr yelle. Bãng-kãng wõnda koom sẽn kõt vɩɩm, bala a kɩtdame tɩ ned paam vɩɩm sẽn ka sate.

Woto linga pagã, bala a Zezi sẽn yeelã fãa yaa sɩda. La a Zezi maana wãn n bãng rẽ fãa? Yaa Wẽnnaam n tʋm a Zezi tẽngã zugu, la yaa yẽ n wilg-a rẽ fãa. A Zezi karen-biisã sẽn yi tẽngã pʋgẽ n lebg n wa mik t’a gomd ne Samari pagã, ling-b lame.
Woto fãa wilgda tõnd bõe? T’a Zezi nonga nebã fãa. Tõnd me segd n nonga nebã fãa. Tõnd pa segd n yãk buud a ye neb n yet tɩ b pa sõma ye. A Zezi ratame tɩ nebã fãa bãng Wẽnnaam n wa paam vɩɩm sẽn ka satã. Tõnd me segd n sõnga nebã tɩ b bãng Wẽnnaam.

Wikipedia sẽn yaa sɛb sẽn pa tar yõodã pʋgẽ
Chakkirako (Japanese: チャッキラコ) yaa reem b sẽn maand Miura, Zapõ, sẽn na yɩl n maan yʋʋm-paalã kibs la b wa ne sũ-noog wʋsgo, sẽn yɩɩd fãa, zĩm yõg wɛɛngẽ.[1] Yʋʋmd 2009 soabã pʋgẽ, b gʋls-a-la UNESCO sẽn boond tɩ " Patrimoine culturel immatériel de l'humanité " wã pʋgẽ. Yʋʋmd 1976 wã, Zapõ goosneema wã reega we-rũngã tɩ yaa bũmb sẽn tar yõod wʋsg la b segd n kogl-a.[2]
B sẽn sɩng n maand we-rũngã yaa Edõ wakatẽ wã, la yaa we-rũngã neb sẽn da wat n be be wã n kɩt tɩ b maan we-rũngã.[3] Yʋʋm kob-gĩnd piig la a nii wã sʋka, a lebga zĩig b sẽn tõe n wilg b pagbã sẽn be be wã. Yʋʋmd fãa, yʋʋm-vẽkr kiuug sʋka, kom-pugli piig n tɩ ta pis-yopoe sẽn tar kimono wã sẽn tar yʋʋma 5 n tɩ tãag 12 maanda we-rũngã wẽnd-doogẽ wã bɩ rot taoorã. Pagb a nu bɩ piig sẽn kʋʋl n naag-ba, n yɩɩnd a capella.

Seb-kãngã boondame tɩ kãab-paalga. Bala sẽn deng rẽnda kãab-kʋdg n dag n be n tũud a Moyiis tõogã. La kãab-kʋdgã dag n segenda kãab-paalgã waoongo, kãab-paalg ning sẽn sɩngd ne a Zezi Kirist rogmã.
Kãab-paalgã tara sɛb 27 d sẽn tõe n welg sags a naase:
1) Pipi sɛb a naasã, yaa koe-noog sẽn gomd a Zezi vɩɩm la b tʋʋm tẽng zug ka wã yelle.
2) Yaa Tʋʋmã sebr sẽn wilg Sɩɩg-sõng sẽn sig karen-biisã zutu, la b sẽn sõng tẽn-tʋmdbã tɩ b tõog n vigl Kirist kaorengã, la b kɩt t'a saag dũni gilli.

A Zeezi ra pa nin-sõng bal ye. D tõe n yeela koɛɛg-koɛɛg bal t’a yɩɩ nin-kãseng sẽn ka to. Ad kʋdemd yel-mitb la bãngdb yʋy sẽn yi sẽn yeel a Zeezi zugu:
“

Hal pĩnd wẽndẽ n tãag masã, a Zeezi vɩɩmã talla pãng nebã zutu, n ket n tar pãng n paasdẽ.”—Amerik kʋdemd yel-mit a Kenneth Scott Latourette.
Biiblã wilgda bũmb ning sẽn kɩt t’a Zeezi yaa kãseng n yɩɩd nin-sõng buud fãa sẽn zĩnd tẽng zugã. A Zeezi sẽn sok a tʋm-tʋmdbã n na n bãng b sẽn tagsd tɩ yẽ yaa ned ningã, b nin-yend leokame n yeele: “Yãmb yaa Kiristã, Wẽnnaam sẽn vɩ wã Bi-ribla.
”—Matye 16:16.

Sɩd me, a Zezi ra yeelame tɩ Wẽnnaam ‘mii tõnd sẽn datã tɩ tõnd nan ka kos’ ye. (Matɩe 6:8) A Davɩɩd sẽn yɩ Israyɛll rĩmã me yeela woto: “Goam sẽn nan ka ta mam zɩlemdẽ, Zu-soaba, gese, yãmb deng n bãng-a-la zãnga.” (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 139:4) Sẽn yaa woto wã, bõe yĩng masã tɩ d segd n pʋʋsd Wẽnnaam? “Kom-dibli yaa pʋɩɩr Zu-soabã sẽn kõta.”—Yɩɩl Sõamyã 127:3.
Biig rogem yaa sũ-noogo, la mi n wata ne zu-loees kãadmã pʋgẽ. Wakat ninga, raoã ne pagã wat n mikame tɩ biigã zãab rɩkda b sẽkã fãa, la wat ne yaamse. Gõeemã sẽn pa le sekdã, n paas bũmb a taab tõe n waa ne mo-yõs pagã ne a sɩdã sʋka. Sẽn paase, yɩl n paam n ges biigã yell la b tõog tɩ zems-n-taar kell n zĩnd b sʋka, lebga tɩlae tɩ b yiibã boog tʋʋm kẽere. Y sã n wa be yel-kãngã pʋgẽ, wãn to la Biiblã sagls tõe n sõng-yã?

Dancing Devils of Corpus Christi yaa Venezuela tẽnsã tũudum kibs sẽn maand a Corpus Christi wã, sẽn maand a Zezi Krista waoogrã Eucharisti wã.[1] A gomda saam-biis 11 sẽn be tẽns toɛy-toɛyã pʋsẽ wã sẽn maand bũmb ninsã yelle. Yʋʋmd 2012 wã, UNESCO Intangible Cultural Heritage wilgame tɩ b sẽn maand bõn-kãens yaa bũmb sẽn pa tar yõod ne nin-buiidã.

1Popeelom boe mɛ la sɛbadoma n tare taromdoma giinle. Na'ayenɛ wan yehe ba daaŋɔ saŋa poan bahɛ. 2Na'ayenɛ n gu'ure ba, ge tara ba vom. Ba yi'ire ba teŋa la poan la popeelomdoma. Hom Na'ayenɛ kan bahɛ te ba diŋdoma nayaŋɛ. 3Ba han bɛn'ɛnra gan'an ba soŋɔ zuo, Na'ayenɛ wan tebɛ ba ban'an la n de bɔra woo. 4Han dɛna mam, mam yeti, Na'ayenɛ, zo'ohɛ mam, ge tebɛ mam, ge mam mi' te mam tom la be'em ho nɛŋan. 5Mam diŋdoma dole mɛ waahena mam n ki daanse'ere daarɛ te n yu'urɛ saalom teŋa wa zuo. 6Ge ba han wa'ana nyɛ mam, ba ne yeen tɔgɔra la nɔmalehom, ge te ba simua la perɛ la pan'ahegɔ ma'an, te ba nya han yehe, ba ta eta la mam yelebibihe. 7Sɛba woo n yaɛ mam la tugi la taaba tobai waahena mam yele bɔ'ɔra taaba, ba bote ne te la woŋɛ mam gaŋɛ mɛ. 8Ba tɛn'ɛhe te ban' too n nyɔkɛ mam, te n pon kan yee bii n ihege ka poan. 9Se'em n de ma zɔ paɛ paɛ te mam dekɛ n mɛŋa delom en, te mam la enŋa lagom dita laa kayena poan la, zagahɛ mam mɛ. 10Ge hom Na'ayenɛ, zo'ohɛ mam, ge le zɛnkɛ mam ze'ele saazuo, te n lerege ba. 11Yele se'ere zuo te mam mina te ho suunre bote mam dela ho ka bahɛ te n diŋdoma nyaŋɛ mam. 12Ge mam ka tare taalɛ zuo, ho tare mam la kaŋkaŋe, ge bahɛ te n bɔna ho nɛŋan bala yɛ'ɛha. 13Na'ayenɛ Israel Yenɛ la dela som ka tara ba'ahegɔ! Film-kãnga pʋga, a Zeezi ne neb a taabã gomda moore. Yaa Burkina neb koees la sẽn dɩk n gãneg filmã pʋgã. Filmã kaoosda lɛɛr a yiibu. Ka wã, yãmb tõe n ges filmã sẽn kʋrs kʋrse wall y mok filim kãngã sẽn yaa wokã begs-begsã. Ẽntɛrnetã pãngã sã n ka waoogẽ, bɩ y yãk sõmblem sẽn zems balã.
Filim-kãngã yaa tɩʋʋsg sõng zãng sẽn wilgd a Zeezi sẽn tũud ne Koe-noog a Luk sẽn gʋlsã. A Zeezi lingda nebã la b ningd-b yãnd wakat fãa, ne bãmb rogmã sẽn bõn-bãndã hal tɩ ta bãmb sẽn vʋʋg n bas kũumã la b arzãn dʋʋbã. Bɩ y ges bãmb vɩɩmã sẽn tũud ne a Luk sebrã koeese, bõn-bãnã fãa, zãmsgã la namsgã fãa.

A Zeezi tog n keta Samaari bɩ Galɩle. Fariizẽ-rãmbã sok-a lame n na n bãng Wẽnnaam soolmã sẽn na n wa wakat ninga. Bãmb tẽedame tɩ na n yɩɩ kibs-kẽenga. La a Zeezi yeel-b lame yaa: “Wẽnnaam soolmã ka wate, n yaa wa bũmb ned sẽn tõe n gẽnes ye. B ka na n yeel tɩ ges-y-yã! Wẽnnaam soolem bee ka wall a bee ka sẽnẽ ye. Bala, ad-y Wẽnnaam soolmã bee yãmb sʋka.”—Luk 17:20, 21.
Kẽer tõe n tagsame t’a Zeezi gomdã rat n yeelame tɩ Wẽnnaam soolmã bee neb nins sẽn tũud Wẽnnaamã sũyẽ. La pa woto ye. Bala ya
... (1059 chars skipped) ... 
a, tɩ nebã fãa tõe n yã. Rat n yeelame t’a sã n wa reeg naamã, neb nins fãa sẽn da gũud rẽ wã na n bãnga vẽenega.
A Zeezi tẽega yɛl sẽn zĩnd pĩndã, n wilg nebã manesem sẽn na n yɩ to-to, yẽ sã n wa reeg naamã. A yeelame: “Bũmb ning sẽn zĩnd a Nowe wakatã na n zĩnda Ninsaal Bi-riblã waoongã wakat me. . . . A na n yɩɩ wa a Lot wakatã. Nebã rag n dɩtame la b yũuda, n daadẽ la b koosdẽ, n bʋtẽ la b metẽ. La daar ning a Lot sẽn yi Sodom tẽngã, bugum yii yĩngr n ni wa saaga, ne kidbri n sãam bãmb fãa.
... (1059 chars skipped) ...
ngo, neb a yiib sẽn na n gõe gãag a yembr zugu, b na n dɩka a ye, n bas a ye.” (Luk 17:34) Dẽnd b na n fãaga neb kẽere, la b sãam sãnda.
Karen-biisã soka a Zeezi yaa: “Zu-soaba, na n yɩɩ zĩ-bʋgo?” A leokame: “Dɩgr sẽn be zĩig ninga, yɩbrend tigimda beenẽ.” (Luk 17:37) Sɩd me, karen-biisã kẽer na n yɩɩ neb sẽn ne yɩɩga, wa yɩbrendã. Karen-bi-kãens na n wa naaga taab n sak Kirisã, sẽn yaa Ninsaal Bi-riblã. Wakat kãnga, a Zeezi na n sõng-b lame tɩ b wʋm Biiblã goam võor sõma, tɩ b tẽebã pãng paase.

Shiraz tãpã (Persian) yaa Pɛrs tãpã buud b sẽn maand tẽn-bõoneg sẽn pẽ Shiraz tẽnga, Irã Fars provense.
Zĩis nins b sẽn maandã nong n yaa buud sẽn da beẽ wã sẽn da minim n maand fu-rɩtba, n dɩkd Kaskaayi, Kamsɛɛ (Basseri la Kamsɛɛ araab rãmba), Afsaar, Abada la Luri wã. Sẽn mik tɩ fu-rɩtbã sẽn da tʋmd ne gãn-tõaagã, fu-rɩtbã ra nong n yaa kãsenga, la naoor wʋsgo, b ra nong n yaa zɛɛg n yɩɩd b buudã. A Shiraz rɩkda Pɛrs (asymétrique) bãndã.
A Sirus wed-pɛɛlgã bee sɛb kẽer pʋsẽ. Yaa Shiraz tãpã bal la b sẽn maan tɩ b tõe n yã wã, tɩ b mak-a wa bõn-yɩgdɩ. B yetame tɩ bõn-kãensã makda sũ-noog la sũ-noogo.
Bãngdb kẽer yeelame tɩ b sã n da na n maan bũmb n na n wilg tɩ b tara yam, b na n tõog n maana b sẽn datã. B sẽn boond tɩ orange wã yaa a Basseri tãpẽ wã.[1]

Cantù a tenòre (Sardinian: su tenòre, su cuncòrdu, su cuntràttu, su cussèrtu, s'agorropamèntu, su cantu a pròa; Itali: canto a tenore) yaa yɩɩl buud sẽn yaa buud buud sẽn be Sardinia tẽn-bilã (Italy tẽn-kãseng a yiib-n-soabã pʋgẽ), sẽn yɩɩd fãa Barbagia soolmẽ wã, baa ne Sardinian tẽn-kɩrems a taab sẽn tar mak-sõamyã.
Yʋʋmd 2005, UNESCO wilgame tɩ cantu a tenore wã yaa bũmb b sẽn tõe n dɩk n mak n wilg tɩ yaa bũmb b sẽn pa tõe n yã wã. [1][2]
B pa segd n zabd ne gom-biig ning sẽn yaa "tenor" sẽn
... (884 chars skipped) ... 
yɩɩla yɩɩl sẽn tar vɛrse-rãmb ne Sarde, sẽn tõe n yɩ kʋdemdã, kʋdemdã, sũ-sãamsã, nonglem bɩ baa maoong buud menga. A yɩɩlã tara gom-biis sẽn pa tar võor (sẽn mik tɩ b boond-b lame tɩ bim-bam-boo).
Sã n yaa ne nebã sẽn yetã, mesu 'oche makda sobgã bʋrgo, tɩ contra makd pe-yãang sẽn bʋrgo, tɩ bassu makd nag-bi sẽn bʋrgo.
A sã n na n sɩng yɩɩl-yendã, yɩɩl-yendã na n sɩngame, tɩ neb a taabã na n wa naag-a, a sã n wilg-b tɩ b na n naag-a lame.

ya Mɛr-tẽng garga, Florida soolmẽ. Yʋʋm fãa ya neb tus-kẽemde n zat n get gargã. Sã ya ne bɛdma ya Dɛf Vale la Yelostone bala n yɩɩd Everglades. Inɛsko kõ noor n yetẽ tɩ Everglades ne Koɛɛng Tortugas ya Biosfɛɛr Zp-vɩʋʋgo yʋʋm 1976 la ya garga Dũni Faad Zĩiga pʋgẽ yʋʋm 1979 wakato, la Ralsa Sɛka naagame tɩ gargã naaga Zĩ-mabrga Zamaan-zẽns kibay Yalemse yʋʋm 1987 wakato. (Ezekɩɛll 26:1-5; Sofoni 2:13-15) Sẽn paase, a Daniɛll bãngr-gomdã reng n togsa dũni gill pãn-soaadbã sẽn da na n pʋg taab to-to Babilon lʋɩɩsã poore. (Daniɛll 8:5-7, 20-22) Sẽn na yɩl n paam vẽnegr bãngr-goam wʋsg sẽn gomd Mesi wã yell sẽn paam pidsg a Zezi Kirist zugã wɛɛngẽ, bɩ y ges seb-neng 199-201 pʋgẽ wã.

Bõn-kãensã yaa bõe? Filip rãmb 4:8 yetame tɩ d tagsd bũmb nins sẽn yaa sɩda, bũmb nins sẽn tar yõodo, bũmb nins sẽn yaa tɩrse, bũmb nins sẽn yaa yɩlma, bũmb nins sẽn tog ne nonglem, bũmb nins sẽn tar kaset-sõngo, bũmb nins sẽn yaa sõma, la bũmb nins sẽn tog ne pẽgrã yelle. Yaa sɩd tɩ b pa yeel tɩ kiris-nebã segd n tagsda Biiblã bal yell wakat fãa ye. La tõnd sẽn tagsd bũmb nins yellã segd n tata a Zeova yam. Pa segd n yɩ bũmb sẽn na n kɩt tɩ maneg n yɩ toog ne-d tɩ d kell n maan sɩd ne-a ye.—Yɩɩn. 19:15.
Tõe n yɩɩ toog tɩ d zãag d mens ne tags-yoodo. D segd n maoo ne d pãn-komsmã, la d mao ne a Sʋɩtãan sẽn yaa “dũni-kãngã wẽnnaamã” me. (2 Kor. 4:4) Bũmb wʋsg b sẽn yiisd televiziõ wã pʋgẽ, sẽn be radio-rãmbẽ wã, ẽntɛrnetã pʋgẽ, la sɛbã pʋsẽ wã sẽn be a nugẽ wã yĩnga, b pa sõma ye. Tõnd sã n pa gũusd ne bũmb nins d sẽn basd tɩ kẽed d yamẽ wã, tõe n kɩtame tɩ d tagsa wã pa le yaa sõma, tɩ d manesmã wa toeeme.—Zak 1:14, 15.

rist Neb” soolem pʋga. La tɩ kẽng Wẽnd-doogẽ, wal tɩ sõng neb nins sen ka são yãmbã, wal tɩ yɩ nĩn-sõng ka kɩtid tɩ ned yɩ a Kirist Ned ye. A Sayull n yɩ Israɛll pipi rĩma. La a Zeova wa n bas-a lame n yãk a Davɩɩd t’a ledg-a. D na n goma a Davɩɩd yell wʋsgo. A sẽn wa n yaa bi-bɩɩga, a zaba ne nin-wobg a Goliate. Kaoosg zugẽ, a wa n zoeeme, bala rĩm a Sayull da maanda sũ-kiir ne-a. Pʋg-sõng a Abigayill me kɩtame t’a pa maan wẽng ye.
Rẽ poore, d na n goma a Davɩɩd biig a Salomo yelle. A Davɩɩd kũumã poore, a Salomo n lebg Israɛll rĩma. A Sayull rɩɩ a naamã yʋʋm 40, a Davɩɩd ne a Salomo me yɩɩ woto. A Salomo kũumã poore, Israɛll soolmã welga zĩis a yiibu. A yembr bee rɩtg t’a ye be goabga.
Rɩtg soabã yaa buud piiga, tɩ goabg soabã yaa buud a yiibu. Rɩtg soabã kaoosa yʋʋm kobs-yi la pis-nu la a yopoe tɩ Asiri nebã yaool n wa sãam-a. Yʋʋm koabg la pis-tã la a tãab poore, b sãama goabg soabã me. Wakat kãnga, b talla Israɛll nebã n kẽng yembd Babilon. Dẽnd babg a naasã gomda yel-kãsems sẽn zĩnd yʋʋm kobs-nu la piig pʋgẽ yelle.

Bõe n kɩt tɩ yãmb ne y zakã rãmb yaa toor ne neb a taabã?” Yãmb sok-a lame yaa: “Bõe yĩng tɩ yãmb sokd woto?” La a yeelame: “Yãmb yaa a Zeova Kaset rãmba, pa sɩda? Yãmb pa wõnd neb a taabã ye. Y pa maand wa tũudum a taabã ye. Wala makre, y pa maand kibs rãmba, y pa kẽesd y toog politikã wall zabã pʋsẽ, y ned baa a ye pa yũud sɩgaar ye. Lɛtr ning Wẽnnaam sẽn vẽneg tʋm-tʋmd a Poll t’a gʋls a Tɩtã pʋgẽ, a yeelame t’a Tɩt ne bi-bɩɩg fãa segd n mao n yɩɩ “mak-sõng tʋʋm-sõma wã wɛɛngẽ ne manesem buud fãa.” (Tɩt 2:6, 7) Sag-kãng pʋgẽ, a yeelame me t’a Zeezi yɩlga neb nins sẽn tũud a Zeova wã sẽn na yɩl tɩ b tʋm “tʋʋm-sõma ne yẽesem.” (Tɩt 2:14) Tʋʋm-sõng a ye b sẽn tõe n tʋm yaa moon Wẽnnaam Rĩungã koɛɛg la b zãms nebã. Y sã n yaa bi-bɩɩga, y na n bẽda ne y sẽn ket n tar pãngã n yɩ sõngr so-pakd wall wakat fãa so-pakd bɩ?—Yel. 20:29.
Yãmb sã n dat n wa lebg so-pakda, y segd n deng magame n bãng y sẽn na n maan to-to n tõoge. (Luk 14:28-30) Wala makre, y na n wa maanda wãn n paamd ligd n get y meng yelle? Y na n maana wãn n paamd lɛɛr-dãmb nins so-pakdbã sẽn segd n moonã? Pʋʋsd-y-yã a Zeova n kot sõngre. (Yɩɩn. 37:5) Sõs-y ne y roagdbã la ne neb sẽn tõog n lebg so-pakdba, n wilg-b y sẽn magd n na n maan to-to. Rẽ poor bɩ y sɩng bũmb toor-toor maaneg sẽn na n sõng tɩ y wa tõog n lebg so-pakda. Sãmbg sẽn kae, a Zeova na n ninga modgr ning y sẽn maand a tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ ne yẽesmã barka!

Bõe yĩng tɩ tar yõod tɩ y maan na-kẽndr koe-moonegã wɛɛngẽ?
Bõe la tigingã neb tõe n maan n keng so-pakd raood la b sõng-a?
Bark-bʋs la sẽn yaa-b so-pakdbã paamda?

GŨUSG GASGÃ Sa-sika 2014 | Yãmb yell paka wẽnnaam bɩ?
Bõe n wilgd tɩ Wẽnnaam geta y yelle?
Wãn to la kɩɩsgã biis namsd pagbã la rapã? Sõs-kãngã gomda pĩnd wẽndẽ pagb sẽn sak Wẽnnaam yelle. A gomda kiris-nin-pogsã sẽn tʋmd tʋʋmd ning koɛɛgã mooneg pʋgẽ wã me yelle.
A Zeova Kaset rãmbã fãa sẽn dat yaa b goamã kẽ b kɛlgdbã. Sõs-kãngã wilgda d sẽn tõe n maan to-to n moon ne seb-vãadã, la d karemd Biiblã n sõsd ne nebã.
Bõe yĩng tɩ tar yõod tɩ d kelgd a Zeova koɛɛgã la d pʋʋsd-a? Sõs-kãngã na n wilga d sẽn tõe n maan to-to tɩ tʋls-wẽns ra paam pãng d sũurẽ wã, t’a Sʋɩtãan me ra tõog n tiis-d tɩ d pa kelg a Zeova ye.

D gom a Rachel yelle. Lekollẽ wã, a Rachel ra paamda not-sõma, n tãag a sẽn wa n ta sẽnkɩɛm (5e). Yɛlã fãa toeemame. Ad a sẽn yeele: “Karen-saambã ra maanda a sẽn tõe sẽn na yɩl tɩ m da paam not-sõng ye.
” Bõe yĩng tɩ ra yaa woto? Karen-saambã yeela a Rachel ne a roagdbã vẽeneg tɩ yẽ kisa a Rachel tũudmã.
Bõe la b maan-yã? A Rachel yeelame: “Karen-saambã sã n da kõ maan not sẽn pa sõma, tɩ yaa vẽeneg tɩ yaa a sẽn kis mam tũudmã yĩnga, maam ne m ma tũuda taab n tɩ sõs ne-a. Bilf-bilfã, a wa n basame.
”
Yel-kãngã buud sã n paam-fo, tall raood n tɩ togs f roagdbã. Tõe tɩ b na n tɩ sõsa ne karen-saambã bɩ ne lekollã taoor-dãmba, tɩ b bao yellã tɩɩm.
La togs sɩdã, pa wakat fãa la f paamd yellã tɩɩm ye. Wakat ninga, yaa f tall sũ-mar bala. (Rom-dãmbã 12:17, 18) Ad a Tanya sẽn tẽeg n yeele: “Tõnd karen-saamb a ye n da namsd tõndo.
” “A mi n tʋʋda tõnd n yetẽ tɩ d zutã kae ye. Sɩngrẽ wã, m da yãbdame. La m wa n kõ-m meng yam, n yetẽ tɩ pa maam m ye la a tʋʋd ye. M da modgdame n kelgd a sẽn zãmsd tõnd bũmb ningã, la m tʋmd sõma. A wa n basa maam sɩɩ, hal n da kõt maam not-sõma. Yaool n da pa wae ye. Yʋʋm a yiib poore, b afɛkt-a lame.”
Ra yĩm ye. Baa f karen-saamb pa nong foo, f sã n tõog toogo, na n naf-f lame. Wala makre, f sã n wa sɩng tʋʋm tɩ f patrõ wã yaa nin-toaaga, na n yɩɩ nana ne-fo. (1 Pɩyɛɛr 2:18) Sẽn paase, f na n maneg n nanda karen-saamb nins sẽn pa namsd foo wã.

Sɩd me, a Davɩɩd biig a Salomo naamã wakate, nin-buiidã sẽn paam bãan la paoong ningã buud ra zɩ n zĩnd ye. La sẽn yɩɩd menga, bũmb kẽer sẽn zĩnd a Salomo naamã sasa wã ra makda Mesi wã naam sẽn na n wa ne bark ka tɛkã.—1 Rĩm. 4:20-5:1; Yɩɩn. 72:1-20.

A Poll yeela a Tɩt t’a “yãk kãsem-dãmb tẽng-tẽnga.” Rũndã-rũndã, tigims sull yel-gɛtbã sã n wa yãkd saam-biis tɩ b na n lebg kãsem-dãmb wall kãsem-sõngdb tigimsã pʋsẽ, b maanda wa sẽn da yaa to-to pipi kiris-nebã wakatẽ wã.
SIGLGÃ TAOOR LƲƖTB SULLI
Siglgã taoor lʋɩtb maanda wa pipi kiris-nebã wakatẽ wã. B bobla tigims sull yel-gɛtbã kãsem-dãmbã la kãsem-sõngdbã yãkr sẽn yaa tʋʋm-kãsengã.
TIGIMS SULL YEL-GƐTBÃ
Tigims sull yel-gɛt fãa segd n maaga a yĩng n ges saam-biis nins kãsem-dãmbã sẽn tagsd tɩ b tõe n lebga kãsem-dãmb wall kãsem-sõngdbã zʋg-sõma wã, la a pʋʋs a Zeova n yaool n yãk sẽn sɩd tõe n lebg-b kãsem-dãmb wall kãsem-sõngdbã.
KÃSEM-DÃMBÃ
Baa b sã n yãk saam-biig t’a lebg kãsem-soaba, a segd n ket n bɩɩsda zʋg-sõma nins Biiblã sẽn wilg tɩ kãsem-soab segd n tallame wã.

Turkish archery wã tãb-bi-bɛɛg (turk: Türk okçuluğu) yaa tãb-bi-bɛɛg buud sẽn paam pãng wʋsg Ottoman soolmẽ wã, baa ne a sẽn sɩng ne Eurasi Steppe wã yʋʋm tus a yiib-n-soabã sẽn deng a Zezi rogmã.[1]
B sẽn wa n bas tãb-biis nins sẽn da zabd ne tãb-biis n zabd ne tãb-biis Lepanto zabrã poore, b ra nong n maanda tãb-biis nins sẽn da zabd ne tãb-biis n zabd ne tãb-biis nins sẽn da zabd ne tãb-biis sẽn da pa tar pãng wʋsg n zabd ne tãb-biis sẽn pa tar pãng wʋsgã. A Mahmoud a yiib-n-soabã naam wakate

e vɛɛs-vɛɛs sẽn naag taaba, n paas tɩɩg sẽn yaa kãn-kãe (kasã wã) la resin, tɩ sãnda me yaa resin zãng-zãng bala.
Zihgir yaa gom-biis sẽn yit Turke, b sẽn da tũnugd ne-a n na n maan tãnsob-n-soodg Ottoman soolmẽ wã. B ra maand-b-la ne raadã, ne kutã, ne na-rɩtgã, ne kõabã, ne yɩɩlã, bɩ ne gãndgã. Zʋg-kãensã ra wilgdame tɩ ned ning sẽn da zãad-a wã yaa zab-zabd soaba. Chamamé (Guarani: party, disorder) yaa Argentinia tʋʋr-soakgẽng la Argentine Mesopotamia buud-goam a ye. Yʋʋmd 2020 soabã pʋgẽ, a Chamamé paama UNESCO sẽn gʋls-a tɩ b gʋls-a-la b sẽn pa tõe n yã bũmb ning sẽn yaa a taab buud-goam pʋɩɩr pʋgẽ wã pʋgẽ, yʋʋm 2018 soabã pʋgẽ. [1][2]
Chamamé yaa mizik buud sẽn yaa buud sẽn yaa toor ne buud ning sẽn be Zu-soab Amerɩka soolmẽ wã, wa Paraguay la Uruguay. [3]
A Zezi rãmb sẽn boog b meng n wa be tẽn-kãng pʋgẽ wã kɩtame tɩ b bɩɩs b kultã, hal tɩ yʋʋm kob-gĩnd 18 soabã saabẽ, Sipãnsã naam yiis a Zezi rãmbã. Tẽnga sẽn be Yapeyú wã pʋgẽ, Corrientes ra yaa mizikã buud-goam sẽn tar pãng wʋsg sẽn yet tɩ yaa pipi Chamame wã rogem zĩiga. B sẽn naag instrument nins sẽn yaa spanyol gilgã, n yaool n wa naag violinã la arkordyonã n paasã, b wa n wa n kɩtame tɩ b bãng bũmb ning b sẽn boond tɩ "Chamamé". B gʋlsa Chamamé yʋʋm kob-gĩnd 20 soabã sɩngrẽ, la b ra gomda "Chamamé" yell yʋʋmd 1931 wã. Sẽn deng rẽ, b ra boond yɩɩlã woto tɩ Corrientes Polka .
A Chamamé wã yaa a sẽn deng n wa ne a Zeova Kaset rãmbã sẽn wa n be Voldga wã. A tara pãng wʋsg ne a sẽn boond t'a Guaraní wã, a sẽn naag ne a sẽn da boond t'i wã, la a sẽn boond tɩ a sẽn wa n wa n be tẽn-kãng yʋʋmd 1900 wã sɩngrẽ wã.
Kamã-rãmbã sʋka, a Teresa Parodi, a Tránsito Cocomarola, a Ramona Galarza la a Chango Spasiuk.[4]

SEBR a ye n be Biiblã pʋgẽ tɩ b boond tɩ Rut sebre. Seb-kãng gomda zak a ye neb sẽn zĩnd Israɛll bʋ-kaoodbã sasa yelle. A Rut ra yaa Moaab neda. A ra pa Israɛll ned ye. La a sẽn wa n bãng tɩ yaa a Zeova la Wẽnnaam sɩd-sɩdã, a sũur yɩɩ noog t’a sak n na n tũ-a ne a sũur fãa. Yaa pʋg-yãang a Naomi n sõng a Rut t’a bãng a Zeova.
A Naomi yaa Israɛll neda. Kom n wa n kẽ Israɛlle, tɩ yẽ ne a sɩdã la b kom-dibli a yiibã yik n kẽng Moaab tẽngẽ wã. La a Naomi sɩdã wa n kiime. A kom-dibli wã kẽe kãadem ne
... (968 chars skipped) ...

A Naomi ne a Rut taa Israɛll n na n zĩnd be. A Rut kell n sɩnga tʋʋm pʋtã pʋsẽ, bala ra yaa ki wã kẽebg sasa. Rao a ye yʋʋr sẽn yaa a Boaaz n sak t’a na n yiis ki wã a pʋtã pʋsẽ. Yãmb mii a Boaaz ma sẽn yaa ned ning bɩ? Yaa a Rahaab sẽn da yit Zeriko wã.

A rogame yʋʋmd 1964 kiuug rasem 5 daarã, la a yita Wa sẽn be Ganaa sẽn be Upper West soolmẽ wã. A paama a lekollã sẽn yi yʋʋm 1976. A paama a O levelã me yʋʋmd 1983 la a A levelã me yʋʋm 1986. Kaagrã pʋgẽ b wilgame tɩ yaa sẽn kẽed ne yam-yãkre, Zʋgnall Rãamd rãmb sẽn yãke, n na n gʋlsd kibaya ne moor n kõt nin-buiidã “Ẽntɛgnetã zugã. B pẽgame, la b wilg b sũ-noogo. B togsame ti yam-yãkrã yaa bũmb sẽn na n sõng neb nins sẽn maan buudã goam kaorengã, tɩ b fãa naag taaba, n wʋmd tẽngã kibay. Nebã faa kibay wʋmb sã n ya a yembre, rẽ sõng

e wã sã n tar tʋʋmde, b gomda ŋe b buudã goama, la b gʋlsd ne rẽ. Rẽ wilgdame tɩ sɩd yaa nin-buiidã yĩnga la “depite” rãmbã tʋmda. Sabaab-kãng kɩtame tɩ b wʋmd b “depite” rãmbã sẽn tʋm toto. D saagdame tɩ bãmb ne a Rãamd tõe n wa tʋma ne

Visite du Directeur de Zoodomail au journal Rãamdé
Dans l’après-midi du mardi 8 mai 2018, le Directeur de zoodomail, monsie
... (808 chars skipped) ...
ceux qui ont de l’intérêt pour les langues de les apprendre à leur rythme.
Un exemple d’illustration parfaite de l’utilisation de langue nationale est donné par l’assemblée nationale au Sénégal où les interventions et les documents sont produits en langues nationales, ce qui permet aux honorables députés de comprendre et de se faire comprendre davantage. Nous espérons qu’une collaboration étroite pourra se créer entre les deux médias à l’avenir dans le but de la promotion des langues nationales.

A Moiiz yiisa Israɛll nebã Ezipt n tall-b n kẽng Sinayi tãngẽ wã. Yaa be la Wẽnnaam kõ-b a noyã. Rẽ poore, a Moiiz tʋma rap 12 tɩ b na n tɩ ges Kanaã tẽngã. La rap 10 n lebg n wa gom goam sẽn yɛɛs nebã tɩ b ra rat n leb Ezipti. Israɛll nebã sẽn pa tẽ Wẽnnaamã yĩnga, a kɩtame tɩ b yeeb rasempʋɩɩgã pʋgẽ yʋʋm 40.
Wẽnnaam wa n yãka a Zozue t’a na n lʋɩ Israɛll nebã taoor tɩ b kẽ Kanaã tẽngã pʋgẽ. A Zeova maana yel-soalem n sõng-b tɩ b reeg tẽngã. A kɩtame tɩ Zʋrdẽ kʋɩlgã koom yalse, la a kɩt tɩ Zeriko lalsã me lʋɩ, la a kɩt me tɩ wĩntoogã yals raar a ye tõre. Yʋʋm a yoob poore, Israɛll nebã tõog n deega Kanaã tẽngã.
Sẽn sɩng ne a Zozue, bʋ-kaoodb n lʋɩ Israɛll nebã taoor yʋʋm kobs-tã la pis-nu la a yoob pʋgẽ. D na n goma bãmb wʋsg yelle. Wala makre, a Barake, a Zedeõ, a Zɛfte, a Samsõ la a Sãmwɛlle. D na n goma pagb kẽer me yelle, wala a Rahaabe, a Debora, a Zayɛlle, a Ruti, a Naomi la a Dalila. Yaa yʋʋm kobs-tã la pis-wɛ la a yoob pʋgẽ la yɛl nins b sẽn togs babg a tãabã pʋgẽ wã maan-yã.

“Bɩ y paam nonglem wʋsg yãmb sʋka, tɩ bõe, nonglem luta yel-wẽn wʋsgo.”—1 Pɩɛɛr 4:8.
Bãng-y tɩ y sẽn kẽ kãadmã, zu-loees pa tõe n pa zĩnd ye. Tõe tɩ yaa y tagsgã ne y yel-manesmã sẽn yaa toore, tɩ y wubrã me pa yembrã yĩnga. Wakat ninga, zu-loeesã yita kɛɛnga. Tõe n yɩɩ yel-lingdem me.
Ninã tõe n wa tagsdame t’a sẽn maand wa yell kae n são. La Biiblã sagenda tõnd tɩ d maan d sẽn tõe n welg zu-loeesã. (Matɩe 5:23, 24) Yaa y sã n sak n tũ Biiblã saglsã la y na n tõog n welg y zu-loeesã sõma.

Biiblã sẽn yete
Biiblã pa gɩdg pag ne rao lageng ye. A wilgame meng tɩ yaa kũun Wẽnnaam sẽn kõt sẽn kẽ-b kãadmã. Hal sɩngrẽ, Wẽnnaam naana “pag ne raoa.” Biiblã yetame tɩ “Wẽnnaam yãndame tɩ bũmb nins fãa bãmb sẽn naanã sɩd yaa sõama hal wʋsgo.” (Sɩngre 1:27, 31) Wẽnnaam talla pagã n wa kõ raoã, n kẽes-b kãadem, n yeel tɩ b yiibã “na n lebga yĩng a yembre.” (Sɩngre 2:24) Dẽnd b ra tõe n kẽe ne taaba.
Biiblã gomda sũ-noog ning rap nins sẽn kẽ-b kãadmã sẽn tõe n paamã yelle. A yeelame: “Maan sũ-noog ne f bi-bɩɩlem wakatẽ paga. . . . Bɩ yẽnda bĩisã kõ foom sũ-noog wakat fãa, la bɩ yẽnda nonglmã soog foom.” (Yel-bũnã 5:18, 19) Wẽnnaam wilgame me tɩ pagbã tog n paama sũ-noog pag ne rao lagengã pʋgẽ. Biiblã yeelame: “Bɩ sɩdã kɩs pagã bũmb ning a sẽn tog n kis-a wã, la tɩ pagã me maan a woto ne a sɩdã.”—1 Korẽnt rãmbã 7:3.
Bũmb ning sẽn pa zemse
Wẽnnaam wilgame tɩ yaa sẽn kẽ-b kãadmã bal n tar sor n tõe n kẽ ne taaba. Ebre-rãmb 13:4 yetame: “Bɩ nebã fãa waoog kãadem, la bɩ ned ne a pag pĩir da zĩnd dẽgd ye. Bala, Wẽnnaam na n sɩbga raglem-dãmba la nin-yoaadbã.” Sẽn kẽ-b kãadmã pa tog n zãmb taab ye. B tog n pidsa b pʋlengã. B sã n dat n paam sũ-noogo, b pa tog n bao bãmb mensã nafr ye. B tog n tũu Biiblã sẽn yet bũmb ningã: “Bɩ yãmb ned kam fãa ra ges a meng sõngr yell bal ye.”—Filip-rãmbã 2:4.

Bõe yĩng tɩ Wẽnnaam sĩnda?
Yʋʋmd 2001 bõn-bɩʋʋng kiuug rasem 11 wã, yibeoog wakat a 8 wã sẽn wa n loog minit 46 sasa, sɩlg sẽn da rɩk neb n fão etaas-wok (World Trade Center) Niu Yorke. Yaa teerorist rãmb n tʋm woto. Rẽ poore, b sɩnga zĩis a taab me sãoongo. Lɛɛr la minit 42 pʋgẽ, na maan neb 3 000 la b kʋ-yã.
Yʋʋmd 2004, yʋʋm-sar kiuug rasem 26
Tẽngã rigimda ne pãng wʋsg Oseyã Ẽndiẽ wã pʋgẽ. Kɩtame tɩ mogrã koom puug n kẽ tẽns 11. Afirik tẽns sẽn be kɩlometr tus a nu zĩigẽ meng n naage. Ra-n-yɛng pʋgẽ, neb nins sẽn ki bɩ sẽn menemame sõor taa tus koabg la pis-nu. Sẽn yɩɩd neb milyõ a ye rot n sãame.
Yʋʋmd 2009, sa-sik kiuugã pipi daare, yʋʋm 42 rao ne a bi-ribl sẽn zems yʋʋm a 5 n da reemd mogrã zug ne montɛɛr sẽn kẽnd koomẽ, n yõsg n tɩ fão raado. Raoã maana yõor zĩig pʋgẽ la biigã pogla wʋsgo. Vẽkembeoogo, yẽ me maana kaalem. Sũ-sãangã pʋgẽ, a roagd a ye yeelame tɩ b ra kota Wẽnd t’a maan yel-solemd tɩ biigã põse.
Y sã n karem sebr sẽn wilgd teerorist rãmbã sẽn kʋ neba, wall sebr sẽn gomd sabab-wẽng a to yelle, pa rẽ bɩ yel-beed sã n paam-yã, y tagsg yaa wãna? Y sokda y meng Wẽnnaam sã n nee yellã bɩ? Y tagsdame tɩ Wẽnnaam basa tõnd bɩ? Biiblã leokda sogs-kãensã hal tɩ kengd raood wʋsgo. Yaa rẽ yell la d na n gome.

... (598 chars skipped) ...
õng-b tɩ b tẽeg bũmb ning yẽ ne a Ba wã sẽn maane, tɩ wẽn-sakdbã tõe n paam b mens ne yel-wẽnã la kũumã. A yõodã yɩɩda zʋɩf-rãmbã Pakã, bala sẽn na n tall-b tẽebã na n paama lohorem hakɩɩka.
A Zeezi yeelame tɩ yẽ zɩɩmã yaa “kãab-paalgã zɩɩm sẽn daag neb wʋsg yĩnga, yel-wẽnã sugr kũun yĩnga.” Neb wʋsg sɩd na n paama b yel-wẽnã sugri, wala makre, tʋm-tʋmdb nins sẽn kell n sak a Zeezi wã, n paas wẽn-sakdb a taab sẽn na n wa naag bãmb n dɩ naam saasẽ ne a Zeezi, a Ba wã soolmã pʋgẽ.—Matye 26:28, 29.

1. Y sã n ket n zãmsdẽ, nafa bʋs la y na n paame?
D yãa Biiblã sẽn yet bũmb ninsã a wãn bala. Rẽ pa kɩt tɩ y maneg n nong a Zeova sɩda? La y tog n modgame tɩ nonglem-kãng paasdẽ. (1 Pɩɛɛr 2:2) Yaa y sã n ket n zãmsd Biiblã, tɩ y zoodã ne Wẽnnaamã paasdẽ la y na n wa tõog n paam vɩɩm sẽn kõn sa wã.
Yãmb sã n bãngd Wẽnnaam n paasdẽ, y tẽebã me na n paasdame. Tẽebã na n sõng-y lame tɩ y ta a yam. (Hebre dãmba 11:1, 6) Leb n na n kɩtame tɩ y tek yam n kos sugri, la y toeem y vɩɩmã tɩ naf-yã.
2. Wãn 
... (136 chars skipped) ... 
me tɩ neb a taab wʋme. Y sã n ket n zãmsd Biiblã, y na n wa tõog n tall-a lame n wilg ned koe-noogã, la bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ y tẽed a Zeova wã.
Y tõe n goma koe-noogã yell ne y zo-rãmb bɩ y roagdba. Yaa woto la wʋsg sɩngda. La gom-y ne yam. Ra sãbg-y b tũudmã ye. Yãmb wee n wilg-b bũmb nins Wẽnnaam sẽn kãabã. La tẽeg-y tɩ b geta yãmb yel-manesmã n yɩɩd y sẽn yetã.
3. Bõe la y tõe n paam tɩ yaa zu-zẽkr bũmbu?
Biiblã zãmsg na n sõnga yãmb tɩ y tẽebã paase. Tarẽ-n-tarẽ, y na n wa pʋʋsa a Zeova n ye

 bãngrã?
Y sã n ket n zãmsd Wẽnnaam Gomdã, y na n bɩɩsa y bãngrã. (Hebre dãmba 5:13, 14) Kos-y-yã a Zeova Kaset soab t’a wa tall Biiblã sɩd yetame tɩ bõe? sebrã n sõng-y tɩ y bãng Biiblã n paase. Y sã n wɩng ne Biiblã zãmsgo, y vɩɩmã na n talla barka.
Koe-noogã yita a Zeova sẽn yaa sũ-noog soabã nengẽ. Y sã n tigimd ne a nin-buiidã, y na n paama a zoodo. (Hebre dãmba 10:24, 25) Bɩ y kell n modge, n tõog n ta a Zeova yam, tɩ y na n wa paama vɩɩm sẽn ka sɛtã. Bũmb kae t’a yõodã ta Wẽnnaam zood ye.

Biiblã yetame: “Nug-pʋg pʋgẽ vʋʋsg n são nug pʋs a yiib pʋgẽ tʋʋmd sẽn wẽnd f sẽn digd sebgo.
” (Koɛɛg soaba 4:6) F sã n pa gõe sõma, bũmb wʋsg la f pa na n tõog n maan sõma.
A Rachel sẽn tar yʋʋm 19 wã yeelame: “Gõeemã sã n pa sek-m daare, m yɛla pa sõma ye. M pa tõe n maan bõn-tɩrga.”
A Kristine tara yʋʋm 19. Ad a sẽn yeele: “Katorzɛɛr (14h) tɛkã tɩ m yɛɛme. Ned tõe n sõsda ne maam n wa mik tɩ m gõeeme.”
La foo yẽ? Gõeemã sekda foo bɩ? Ad kom-bɩɩs kẽer sẽn maane.
Gãand pĩnda. A Catherine sẽn tar yʋʋm 18 wã yeelame t’a modgd n kẽeda pĩnda.
Kʋʋg sõsga. A Richard tara yʋʋm 21. Ad a sẽn yeele: “Pĩndã, m zo-rãmbã ra mi n boonda maam ne telefonne, bɩ n toond-m mesaaz-rãmb hal tɩ zĩigã wa zʋʋge.
La masã, m kʋʋgda sõsgã la m tɩ gãande.
”
Yãk wakat takɩ. A Jennifer sẽn tar yʋʋm 20 wã yeelame tɩ yẽ yãka lɛɛre,
tɩ sã n ta bal la a sẽn kẽed gãaga.
F sẽn tõe n maane: Modg tɩ yʋng fãa bɩ f gũs lɛɛr a nii.
Fo sã n modg n tũ sagls kẽere, f na n paam n gũsa sõma tɩ naf-fo. F na n tara yĩns laafɩ, f sũur na n yɩɩ noog ne f menga, f na n tʋmda sõma me.
Vɩɩmã pʋgẽ, bũmb wʋsg la f pa tõe n maan ye. La f tõe n maana f sẽn tõe sẽn na yɩl tɩ f yĩnsã tar laafɩ.
A Erin yeelame: “Sẽn yaa a soab fãa, f tara laafɩ tɩ f pa tare, yaa foo la pak n yɩɩda.
”

Nanamsa zu-loees yaa saksa tâabo naam la têeba wêengê
1. Nanams nins sên maand-b Rogem-n-mikâ
Rogem-n-mikâ la woto :
- Râ-yûuga
- Mâand kùùbo
- Pagb wùsgo
- Pagb reegre buuda pùgê
- Kom-puli kûuni
- Kààm-doogo.
Woto kàtame tà b tar gàdgre ne Tiugung sakerma râmbâ.
2. Nanams nins sên pa maand-b rogem-n-mikâ
2.1. Nanams kêer basdame tà b maand Rogem-n-mika bâmb yùur yînga
- B kàta b nung bûmbu la b tà zînd n gese (mâando) : Woto kàtame tà b và sâmb-sâmb pùgê (tôe n zînd n gesame bà pa tôe ? Mâanda nemd wâdame bà ?).
Bâmb sôor tôe n yàà wùsgo.
2. 2. Nanams kêer sak n basa Rogem-n-mika zânga, la b sôor pa waoog ye.
Bâmb gâda b têebâ tà rabeeem kaal ye. La neba pa basd-b laafi ye, b yet b lame tà b pa tog n bas rogem-n-mika zâng ye.
Bâmb sâ n paam zu-loeese, b yetame tà ya b sên pa tûud rogem-n-mikâ.
2. 3. D bâng tà naama reegr wakato yèl kêer n be tà b pa tôe n gill ye (zâoongê kôom, la yèl a taaba).
2. 4. Nanams-bèda sên kô-b-râmb naama pa so b mens ye. Wakat ninga yaa modgre tà b maand nanaams bèda tùùma, la woto tôe n waa ne Mees vaalgo.
2.5. Naama ne Politikâ
Parti politik fâa ratame tà naab kê yênda. Woto wata ne welgre.
Sokre : Rogem-n-mika yèl pùsê bôe n zemsd ne Kirista têebâ, la bôe n pa zemsd ne têebâ ?
Bôe la naab tôe n maane la bôe la a pa tôe n maane ?
Dênd tà d wa ràk yèla ball balle n bale Wênd Gomda vêenemê n bâng sên segd la sên pa segde.
B loba ligd zîig pùgê n paam tûs a tâ la kobs nii.

Bũmb tõe n yɩɩ a Zeova noog wall sãam a sũur bɩ?
SOKRÃ leoor sã n yaa n-ye, a wata ne sokr a to. Sok-kãng la woto: Rẽ yĩnga tõnd manesem tõe n sãama Wẽnnaam sũur wall noog a sũur bɩ? Pĩnd wẽndẽ filozof rãmb kẽer yeelame tɩ pa tõe ye. B ra yetame tɩ ned pa tõe n maan Wẽnnaam bũmbu, la tɩ Wẽnnaam sũur pa tõe n sãam wall yɩ noog ye. La b sẽn yeelã yaa toor fasɩ ne Biiblã sẽn yetã. Biiblã pʋgẽ, b wilgdame tɩ bũmb tõe n yɩɩ a Zeova noog wall sãam a sũuri, la tɩ bũmb nins tõnd

ng ne Wẽnnaam, n sokd b mens a sã n na n tõog n gesa bãmb yelle, la a sã n pʋd n dat n gesa b yelle. (Sõdbo 14:1-4) Sebr a ye b sẽn yiis n na n sõng biibl-lɛbgdbã pʋgẽ, b yeelame tɩ gom-biis nins b sẽn lebg ka tɩ “naoor wʋsg la b tõdg bãmbã” rat n yeelame me tɩ “b kɩtame tɩ b sũyã lebg kɛgems Wẽnnaam taoore,” wall tɩ “b yeela Wẽnnaam tɩ ‘ayo.’” Baasgo, a Zeova sẽn yaa nimbãan-zoeer soabã, b sã n da mi n wa tek yam n kos sugri, a sakdame n kõ-b sugri. La rẽ poore, b wat n le rɩka b pĩnd zʋgã n le

Wall tɩ d yãk yam n maand yel-wẽn n sãamd a Zeova sũurã, d tõe n yãka yam n maand sẽn yaa tɩrga, n noogd a sũuri. Pʋd n yaa woto bal kɛpɩ la a rat t’a nin-buiidã maane. Ad a sẽn yeele: “M biiga, maan yam n kõ maam sũ-noogo, tɩ m paam n leok sẽn paoogd-a maamã.” (Yelbũna 27:11) Bũmb kae t’a yõodã ta d sẽn na n tõog tɩ d sẽn vɩ to-to wã noogd a Zeova sũur ye.

A MOIIZ sẽn ta Eziptã, a togsa a kẽem a Aarõ Wẽnnaam sẽn maan yel-soalem nins fãa n wilg-a wã. A Moiiz ne a Aarõ maana yel-soalmã n wilg Israɛll nebã, tɩ b fãa tẽ tɩ yaa a Zeova n sɩd tʋm-ba.
A Moiiz ne a Aarõ kẽnga a Faraõ nengẽ n tɩ yeel-a yaa: ‘Israɛll Wẽnnaam a Zeova yeelame tɩ f bas a nebã tɩ b kẽng weoogẽ wã n tɩ maan kibs n waoog-a rasem a tãabo.’ La a Faraõ leokame yaa: ‘Mam ka mi a Zeova ye. M ka na n bas Israɛll nebã tɩ b loog ye.’
A Faraõ sũurã puugame, bala Israɛll nebã da rat n basa

ova. A modg-b lame tɩ b tʋm wʋsg n paase. Israɛll nebã yeelame tɩ yaa a Moiiz n kɩt tɩ b namsd-b woto. Rẽ sãama a Moiiz sũurã. La a Zeova yeela a Moiiz t’a ra sãam a sũur t’a na n modga a Faraõ t’a bas a nebã tɩ b looge.
A Moiiz ne a Aarõ kẽnga a Faraõ nengẽ yɛsa. La so-kãnga, b maana yel-solemde. A Aarõ loba a rasaarã tẽng tɩ lebg waafo. A Faraõ bag-bʋgdbã me loba b rasabã tẽng tɩ lebg wiisi. La a Aarõ waafã vela bag-bʋgdbã wiisã. Baasg zãnga, a Faraõ ka bas Israɛll nebã tɩ b loog ye.

Sig-noy kiuug rasem a 9 yʋʋm 2018 soabã, bʋ-kaoodbã karma sɛb nins b sẽn dɩgl sig-noy kiuug rasem a 8 yʋʋm 2018 soabã , sebã pʋgẽ, « ɛssepeya » Some n paas Metr Poll Keere wilgame, tɩ neb a nii Continuer la lecture Naam wẽ-n-dɩk vaallã bʋʋd leb n paka a kʋɩlense
Tõnd tẽngã baobg ning sẽn be Sayall soogã bʋ-kaoodb paga bʋ-kaod zakã kʋlens la b looge. Omega kiba-kɩtb pẽnega a Rodirg Bayala Avoka rãmbã sẽndika seb-gʋnd-kasenga, n na n bãng gofneem tagsg ne bʋ-kaod zakã sẽn pag a kʋlensã, b Continuer la lecture Gibo soog bʋ-kaoodbã paga b kʋlense.
Rundã, Tʋʋlg kiuug rasem 28 wã daare a Farẽnsoa KÕMPAOOR na n kẽnga « Parɩ » bʋʋ-kaoodbã taoore, sẽn kẽed ne Burkina Faso rãmb sẽn maan Koosg sebr n dat tɩ b tall ning kãnga n lebg n wa Burkina Faso ta Continuer la lecture A Farẽnsoa KOMPAOOR na n kẽnga «Parɩ» sẽn yaa «Farẽns» nã-tẽngã bʋʋ-kaodb taoor rundã, tʋʋlg kiuug rasem 28 daare
Sodaasã bʋ-kaood ro-kaseng yiisa moooneg koɛɛg n wilg Burkĩna nin-buiidã la zamaan-zẽns rãmbə, tɩ naam wẽ-n-dɩk ning sẽn zĩnd 2015 yʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã, a bʋʋdã na n yɩɩ tʋʋlg kiuug rasem pisi la a ye raare. Moonegã koɛɛg wilgame tɩ Continuer la lecture Naam wẽ-n-dɩk vaallã sẽn zĩnd 2015 yʋʋmdã pʋgẽ, a bʋʋdã na n le pak a kʋɩlense tʋʋlg kiuug rasem pisi la a ye raare.

A YÕODÃ: Wẽnnaam Gomdã zãmsg sõngd-d lame tɩ d “bãng sɩdã yalem, a woglem, a zãntlem la a zulum sõma.” (Efɛ. 3:18) Sõngd-d lame me tɩ d kell n yɩ neb sẽn pa tar taale, la sẽn pa tar rẽok baa bilf zãmaanã neb sẽn yaa wẽnsã sʋka, la d kell ‘n gãd vɩɩm koɛɛgã kãn-kãe.’ (Fili. 2:15, 16) D sã n na n zãms Biiblã, d tõe n yãka bũmb sẽn na n sõng tõnd mengã zĩig takɩ wɛɛngẽ n zãmse. Rẽegd-y vɛrse-rãmbã la y gʋlsd bũmb kẽer Biibl ning y sẽn tar n zãmsdẽ wã pʋgẽ. Tõe n yɩɩ ne tablɛte, wall portaable.

Bʋgs-y y sẽn karmã zug n ges sẽn tõe n naf yãmb mengã to-to.

Sõs-kãngã pʋgẽ, b leokda sogsg nebã sẽn mi n sokd b mense, la b wilgd Biiblã zĩis nins d sẽn tõe n yã b leoorã. Y sã n dat t’a Zeova Kaset soab wa tɩ y sõs rẽ zugu, a na n saka ne yamleoogo.

Segdame tɩ d sak Wẽnnaam, bala yaa yẽ n naan tõndo. A Zezi meng saka Wẽnnaam wakat fãa. (Zã 6:38; Wilgri 4:11) D sã n sakd Wẽnnaam noyã, d wilgdame tɩ d nong-a lame.—Karm-y 1 Zã 5:3.

19 La bõe yĩng tɩ Wẽnnaam bas malɛg-wẽnsã la wẽnemã sẽn namsd nebã wʋsg woto wã tɩ beẽ? B na n leoka sok-kãngã sak ning sẽn pʋgdã pʋgẽ.

1. Koe-noog n be sẽn ki-bã yĩng bɩ?
Daar a ye, a Zezi zoa a Lazaar sẽn da be Betani sẽn pẽ Zerizalɛmmã maana kaalem. A Zezi kẽnga be, la rẽ t’a kaalmã taa rasem a naase. A tũu a Mart ne a Maari sẽn yaa kiidã tãopã n kẽng yaoogẽ wã, la tao-tao tɩ nebã tigmame. A Zezi vʋʋga a Lazaare. A Mart ne a Maari sũur yɩɩ noog wʋsgo.
A Mart ra miime tɩ koe-noog n be sẽn ki-bã yĩnga. A ra miime t’a Zeova na n wa vʋʋga sẽn ki-bã, tɩ b le vɩɩmd tẽngã zugu.
2. Ned sã n ki, a le mii bũmb bɩ?
Wẽnnaam naana ninsaal
... (134 chars skipped) ... 
. Rẽ n so t’a Lazaar vʋʋgrã poore, a pa yeel t’a yãa bũmb ye. Bala kũum pa mi baa fʋɩ ye.
Wẽnnaam sɩbgda neb bugum-yir bɩ? Biiblã sẽn yet tɩ kũum pa mi bũmbã yĩnga, rẽnd b sẽn yet tɩ Wẽnnaam sɩbgda neb bugum-yirã yaa ziri fasɩ. B sãamda Wẽnnaam yʋʋre. Yõog ned bugum pʋd n yaa bũmb Wẽnd sẽn kisi.
3. Sẽn ki-bã tõe n goma ne tõnd bɩ?
Ned sẽn ki pa tõe n gome, a pa wʋmde. (Yɩɩl Sõamyã 115:17) La malɛgs kẽer n lebg wẽnse, n tõe n gom ne nebã tɩ yaa wa sẽn ki-bã n gomda. (2 Pɩɛɛr 2:4) A Zeova gɩdgame 
... (134 chars skipped) ...
s b sẽn da pa mi Wẽnnaam sõma wã yĩng na n vʋʋgame.
Sẽn na n vʋʋg-bã na n paamame tɩ b zãms-ba, tɩ b bãng Wẽnnaam la b sak a Zezi n wilg tɩ b tẽed-a lame. (Wilgri 20:11-13) Sẽn na n sak-b n maan Wẽnnaam daabã na n vɩɩmda tẽngã zug wakat sẽn kõn sa.
5. Kũum vʋʋgrã wilgda tõnd bõe a Zeova zugu?
Yaa Wẽnnaam sẽn sak t’a biigã wa ki tõnd yĩngã n kɩt tɩ sẽn ki-bã tõe n wa vʋʋgã. Dẽnd kũum vʋʋgrã yaa bark tɛkẽ! La leb n wilgdame t’a Zeova nonga ninsaalbã. Ãnda la y yãgd n dat n yã sẽn ki-bã vʋʋgr sasa?

Vẽenega, Wẽnnaam sã n wa leok d pʋʋsgã, n pids pipi bũmb a tãab nins a Zezi sẽn yeel tɩ d kosã, ninsaalbã na n paama bũmb nins b sẽn dat ne b sũur fãa wã. La bũmb a taab me la a Zezi yeel tɩ d kose. Sõsg ning sẽn pʋgdã pʋgẽ, d na n goma bõn-kãens yelle.

Armagedõ na n yɩɩ dũniyã saab bɩ?
ARMAGEDÕ! Yãmb sã n wʋm gom-bi-kãngã, bõe n wat y yamẽ? Neb kʋʋng b sẽn varg n kʋ yaare, bɩ ãndũni wã fãa sẽn yõk bugum bɩ? Tẽns kẽer pʋsẽ, b nong n wʋmda Biiblã gom-biig ning sẽn yaa Armagedõ wã nebã goamẽ. Naoor wʋsgo, b bilgda Armagedõ wa yel-be-kãseng sẽn na n paam ãdem-biisã. B yiisa filim dãmb sẽn wilgd sãoong sẽn yaa kãseng n na n bilg Armagedõ, tɩ nebã yã n tagsdẽ tɩ Armagedõ na n sɩd yɩɩ boto. Woto kɩtame tɩ wʋsg tar tags kɛg Armagedõ zugu. B bilgd-a-la ne manesem toor-toore, la bilg-kãens baa a yembr pa zems ne Biiblã sẽn yet Armagedõ zugã ye.
Sẽn mik tɩ sã n yaa ne Biiblã, Armagedõ tara loees ne “dũniyã sɛɛbã,” y pa ne tɩ tara yõod wʋsg tɩ d bao n bãng a võor sõma sɩda? (Matɩe 24:3) Wẽnnaam Gomdã la sɩdã yẽgre. Rẽnd zemsame tɩ y bao n bãng Armagedõ võorã la a sẽn pak yãmb ne y zakã rãmb to-to wã be.
Vaees-kãng na n kɩtame tɩ y bãng tɩ Armagedõ pa yel-beed sẽn na n sãam dũniyã, la t’a na n yɩɩ zãmaan-paalg sẽn na n tall bark sɩngr n kõ neb nins sẽn dat n vɩɩmd sũ-noog vɩɩm dũni-paalg pʋgẽ wã. Y sã n karem sõsg ning sẽn pʋgdã, y na n wʋma yel-kãensã sẽn be Biiblã pʋgẽ wã võor sõma, bala y na n bãnga Armagedõ sẽn sɩd yaa a soaba.

A YÕODÃ: Tʋm-tʋmd a Poll gʋlsa lɛta 14 n keng a tẽed-n-taasã raoodo. Pipi Korẽnt rãmb sebrã bee lɛt-kãens sʋka. Ned sã n na n gʋls lɛtre, a tõe n maaga a yĩng n tags n bao gom-biis sẽn zemse. Sẽn na n deeg-a lɛtrã me tõe n karm-a lame n yɩlme. D tõe n tũnuga ne lɛta n taas d roagdb la d mitins koe-noogã sõma. D leb n tõe n tũnuga ne-b n taas koɛɛgã neb nins d sẽn pa tõe n paam n sõs ne wã. Wala makre, nina tõe n wilgame t’a rat n bãng n paasame, tɩ yaool n yaa toog tɩ d paam-a yiri. Tõe n yɩɩ toog tɩ d paam d moonegã zĩigẽ neb kẽere, b sẽn be ro-bɛd pʋsẽ tɩ neb gũudẽ, pa rẽ bɩ b sẽn be zĩ-zãrsẽ yĩnga. D sã n na n gʋls ned lɛtre, bõe la d pa segd n yĩmi, sẽn yɩɩd fãa sã n yaa ned d sẽn pa mi?
SẼN SEGD N YƖ TO-TO:
Gʋls-y y sẽn da na n yeel-a, y sã n da paam n na n sõs ne-a. Sɩngrẽ wã bal bɩ y gʋls y yʋʋre, la y wilg bũmb ning sẽn kɩt tɩ y gʋls-a wã. Y tõe n soka sokr sẽn na n kɩt t’a tagse, la y wilg-a tõnd sɩtã. Wilg-y-yã-a t’a tõe n kẽe tõnd sɩtẽ wã n zãms Biiblã, wall y yeel-a t’a tõe n paamame tɩ b wat n zãmsd-a a zakẽ wã, pa rẽ bɩ y wilg-a sebr tõnd sẽn tar n zãmsd nebã Biiblã sags kẽere. Y tõe n naaga jw.org kartã, booll sebre, seb-vãoog wall bũmb a to n tool-a.
Ra gʋls-y lɛt-woko, tɩ karengã wa yɩ yaams ne-a ye.—Ges-y seb-neng a 8 wã, n bãng y sẽn tõe n gʋls to-to.
Y sã n sa bɩ y lebs n karem n ges y pa tudgi, karengã sã n yaa nana, la y sã n goma ne waoogre. Ning-y tẽmbr sẽn zemse.

A Hamza Adam yaa nina b sen dog yʋʋmd 1975 Zĩ-likr Kiuugu rahem pis-tã raare. A yaa Ghana politik neda, la a me yaa ned nina sen be National Democratic Congress. Yend la depite soab n ko Kumbungu Constituency soolma sen be Ghana Northern Region.[1][2]
zĩ-likr kiuugu daham pis-tã yʋʋm 1975 la o da ân dogã Adam.A zãar-ã PhD n ya lékolé bang'r kasenga Rural Livelihoods bang'r pugin,MPhil Agricultural Extension bang'r la BSc Agricultural Technology bang'r.[1][3]
Adam da ân ya karen-saamba la taoor soaba o b Departma pugin m'be University for Development St[3]
Yʋʋmde 2020 Ghana guvernema naam yãkr wakato, nè'b 24,278 n da ân yãk Adam ti a lebg o b parliment wilga Kumbungu tênga.[4]
Adam tùudà lɩsɩlaam deeni[1]

Kom-bɩɩs nins b sẽn nong n yaand n yɩɩdã. Yaa kom-bɩɩs nins sẽn kẽed b taabã, n zoet yãnde, bɩ sẽn pa nand b mensã.
Neb sã n tũnugd ne ẽntɛrnetã n yaand b taabã, tõe n waa ne yelle. Tõe n kɩtame tɩ b sẽn yaand a soabã zãag a meng ne nebã, wall n bẽ dépression wã. Nina meng kʋʋda a menga.

Togs kãsma. Togs f roagdbã nanda. Sẽn yaand-a foo wã sã n tũnugda ne ẽntɛrnetã sɩt ninga, bɩ f togs neb nins sẽn so sɩtã. La yellã sã n zoe n paama pãnga, foo ne f roagdbã tõe n togsa f lekollã taoor dãmba, bɩ n tɩ togs polɩɩs-rãmbã wall y tall yellã meng n kẽng bʋʋdo.

Emmanuel Armah Kofi Buah dogã 1966 A ya Ghana politik neda, yẽ get Ghana Minister of Energy la Petroleum tʋʋmda hal yʋʋmde 2013. Kofi Buah ya National Decomcratic Congress wilga la Tẽng-kugr maanda n yé Ellembelle saka m'be Ghana nen-taoore .Yẽ ya Deputy Minority kasma Ghana Parliment pugin a sɩn da ân dééga woto kasonga James Klutse Avedzi nêngin.
A Emmanuel Armah Kofi Buah paama sɛb kareng Laloa pugẽ la a paama la lekolle kaseng ning b sẽn boond tɩ Kwame Nkrumah University of Science and Technology (Saans la Teknolozĩ) wã, la a le paama Masters of Science sɛb kareng n ko Laog Zaabo n yi University of Maryland, University College karẽn sẽn be Ameriki Naag Taaba Leta (Anglindi: United States of America) wã.
A Kofi Buah yaa tẽnga taoor soab a John Evan Atta Mills sẽn yãk yʋʋm 2009 t'a yɩ energetik minisr sull taoor soaba. [1] Yʋʋmd 2013 yʋʋm-vẽk kiuug rasem 17 wã, b yãka a Bua t"a lebg energetiki la petroli minisɛɛr. [2] A Boakye Agyarko n wa n dɩ a naamã yʋʋmd 2017 wã, la a sẽn wa nẽ a New Patriotic Party wã n tõog n maan yʋʋm 2016 wã na-kẽndre. [1] Yẽ sɩngi n yã parliment wilga Ellembelle saka hal yʋʋmde 2009[1] A yaa depite nẽd bɩ tẽnga depite ramb soog taoor soab sẽn be Ellembelle tẽnga pʋga, yʋʋmd 2009 soabã tɛka. [2] A tumda Tʋntʋmdb (Anglindi: Trade), Lozind Tʋʋma (Anglindi: Industry) la Yamleo-goore (Anglindi: Tourism) komiti-ramb pugẽ.
A Buah ya Kris neda la a tara kamb a yiibu.[1][2]

Coopération missionnaire : L’archidiocèse de Ouagadougou bénéficie d’un minibus
Le Lundi 03 Aout 2020, l’archidiocèse de Ouagadougou a bénéficié d’un minibus 
... (605 chars skipped) ...
 de Francs Cfa.
Pour le PCA de l’hôpital Paul VI, Léné SEBGO cette ambulance facilitera le transport le transport des malades des malades de Paul VI aux autres structures de santé de la ville de Ouagadougou.
Pour le cardinal Philippe OUEDRAOGO, l’hôpital Paul VI a déjà reçu au nom de l’archidiocèse de Ouagadougou , une ambulance, un scanner et du matériel médical pour ses différents services. Il rend grâce à Dieu pour cette amitié et cette solidarité entre les peuples et entre les églises sœurs.

“Wakat fãa . . . tõnd tẽegda yãmb tẽebã tʋʋmd ne y nonglmã tʋʋmdã” yelle.—1 TES. 1:3.
1. A Poll tagsg ra yaa wãn ne neb nins sẽn tʋmd wʋsg koe-moonegã yĩngã?
TƲM-TƲMD a Poll ra nanda neb nins sẽn tʋmd wʋsg koe-moonegã yĩngã. A yeelame: “Wakat fãa tõnd Ba a Wẽnnaam taoore, tõnd tẽegda yãmb tẽebã tʋʋmd ne y nonglmã tʋʋmdã, la y sẽn maand sũ-mar n gũud tẽeb pidsg sẽn be tõnd Zu-soab a Zezi Kirist nengẽ wã.” (1 Tes. 1:3) A Zeova me nanda bũmb nins d sẽn maand a tʋʋmdã pʋgẽ wã. A Zeova nee yãmb sẽn maandã bɩ?
Y NA N leoka sok-kãngã tɩ bõe? Neb wʋsg na n yeela woto: ‘Mam tara hakɩk tɩ Wẽnnaam yãa tʋʋm nins rap wala a Moiiz, a Zedeõ la a Davɩɩd sẽn tʋma, la m yam yood ne bũmb ning mam sẽn maandã sã n pak-a lame. Mam pa tõe n mak m meng ne a Moiiz, a Zedeõ bɩ a Davɩɩd ye.’
Yaa sɩd tɩ Biiblã pʋgẽ, b wilgda tẽn-kʋdem wẽndẽ rap sẽn yɩ tẽedb hakɩk sẽn tʋm tʋʋm-kãsems ne tẽebo. ‘B tõoga soolem wʋsgo, b paga gɩgma noyã, b sãama bugum pãnga, la b põs sʋʋg noore.’ (Hebre dãmba 11
... (3844 chars skipped) ... 
 fãa pʋgẽ, a ra baood n na n taa Wẽnnaam yam. A ra mii vẽeneg tɩ Wẽnnaam tũub baooda sẽn yɩɩd vɩɩm manesem sẽn yaa yɩlemd bal tallgo. A Zeova ra ratame t’a moone. (Ziid 14, 15) A ra segd n keooga nebã tɩ Wẽnnaam da nee b wẽn-kɩɩsg tʋʋmã. A Enok kell n tũu Wẽnnaam n kaoos sẽn yɩɩd yʋʋm 300 pʋgẽ. Tõnd ned ba a yembr nan pa tall sũ-mar kɩs-sɩd pʋgẽ tɩ kaoos woto ye. La a Enok kell n tũu Wẽnnaam a yõor tɛka.—Sɩngre 5:23, 24.

ã. Bɩ d rɩk Wẽnnaam togs-n-taare, n yɩt tao-tao n wilgdẽ tɩ d nee modgr ning neb a taabã sẽn maandã. (Efɛɛz rãmba 5:1) Bõe yĩng tɩ y pa na n gũus n ges kiris-neb a taabã sẽn modgd to-to n wat tigissã, n yit koe-moonegã, bɩ b sẽn maood to-to ne vɩɩmã zu-loees daar fãa wã?
Woto, bɩ y kɩt tɩ neb nins sẽn lagem ne-y n balemd a Zeova wã bãng tɩ y nanda b modgrã. B sã n mik tɩ y nee b sẽn maandã la y tagsd b yelle, na n nooga b sũuri, la y na n tõogame n kõ-b bas-m-yam t’a Zeova meng nee b sẽn maandã.

Y SẼN TÕE N MAAN TO-TO:
Y goamã tog n yita y sũurẽ. Y sã n wa segend y sõsgã, tags-y koɛɛg ning y sẽn dat n taasã yõod sẽn ta zĩig ningã zugu. Bao-y n bãng-y bũmb ning y sẽn na n yeelã sõma. Rẽ, nebã na n yãame tɩ y goamã yita y sũurẽ.
Tags-y kɛlgdbã yelle. Tags-y bũmb ning y sẽn na n yeelã sẽn na n naf neb a taabã to-to wã. Bao-y n bãng-y y sẽn na n togs rẽ to-to tɩ naf-ba.
Y sõsgã sasa, ra maan-y laas-laas ye. Gom-y ne yẽesem. Y sẽn bilsd ne y nusã to-to wã la y nengã tog n wilga y tagsg sẽn yaa a soab koɛɛg ning y sẽn taasdã zugu.

Yaa Ghana karẽn-biis sẽn be Akra, Gana. Yaa Ghana sẽn yaa tẽng zug karẽn-biis sẽn yaa kãsenga. mos_Latnmos_Latnmos_Latn be be Yaa yʋʋmd 1948 la b lugl-a tɩ yaa Zĩig Koɛɛg Koɛɛg (University College of the Gold Coast) sẽn be Zĩigkoɛɛg Koẽg soolmã pʋgẽ. Sɩngrẽ wã, yaa Londr Inivèsite kolɛj sẽn yaa a taaba, [1] sẽn get a karen-biis programã yelle, la a kõt b diplɩmsã. [2] Yʋʋmd 1957 wã, Ghana sẽn paam b yembrã poore, b kɩtame tɩ b lebg Ghana Inivɛrsite College. [1] A leb n toeem a yʋʋr n lebg Ghana Yuniõrga yʋʋmd 1961, a sẽn paam n paam a meng n lebg Yuniõrgã. [1] mos_Latnmos_Latnmos_Latn be be Gãna Yuniõrsa wã beẽ n be Akra Legon tãensã sẽn be Zapẽ wã la Akra tẽnga pʋga sa-narkẽ wã. Yaa karen-biis sẽn yɩɩd 60000 n be be be wã. [1]

Guosa yaa buud-gomd sẽn naan ne taaba, a Alex Igbineweka n naan-a yʋʋmd 1965. B sẽn maan-a wã yaa sẽn na yɩl t'a yɩ Nizɛɛr buud-goam nins b sẽn gomd tẽngã pʋgẽ wã lagem-n-taar buud-gomde, la a yɩ buud-gomd b sẽn gomd Afirikdisiid tẽns pʋsẽ.
A tara zʋg-sõma kãensã:
- Yaa buud-gomd sẽn welg-a toore, tɩ gom-biis nins b sẽn boond tɩ subject-verb-object sõssã sẽn pʋgdã yaa toor-toore.
- B pa tar sõss ye.
- B pa tar gom-biis la yʋy sẽn yaa toor-toore ye.
- Gom-biis wʋsg sẽn tar võor ne gom-biis a taabã yaa gom-biis sẽn dengd gom-biis nins b sẽn toeemdã.
- B sã n wa gʋls gom-biis n na n pʋgl yʋ-peellã, b lebgda yʋ-peellã.
- Guosa wã yaa gom-vɩɩd sẽn wilgd bũmb ning sẽn be a pʋgẽ wã.

D waoog a Zezi sẽn yaa Davɩɩd-kãseng la Salomo-kãsengã
“Gese, sẽn yɩɩd a Salomo bee ka.”—MAT. 12:42.
1, 2. Bõe yĩng tɩ nebã ra pa tõe n tẽ tɩ yaa a Davɩɩd la a Zeova na n kɩt t’a Sãmwɛll zae t’a wa lebg rĩmã?
B SẼN wa n na n zae a Davɩɩd t’a wa lebg rĩmã t’a ra yaa biiga, n kɩɩmd piisi. A Sãmwɛll meng ra pa tagsd t’a Zeova na n yãka a Davɩɩd t’a wa lebg rĩm ye. Sẽn paase, Betlehɛm sẽn da yaa a Davɩɩd ba-yirã ra yaa tẽn-bila. Biiblã yetame tɩ Betlehɛm nebã yaa “buud sẽn yaa bilf Zida buudã sʋka.”

1Na'ayenɛ, n diŋdoma wa zo'e mɛ! Ba lɛ n ihege zɛ' a te ba zabɛ la ma. 2Ba zo'e zo'e tɔgɔre mam yeti, Yenɛ kan fan' en. 3Ge hom Na'ayenɛ n de mam tɛ'ɛlega, kae mam mum. Hom n ka'are som bahera mam zuo na, ge zɛnkera mam zuo. 4Mam kaahere bɔ'ɔra la hom Na'ayenɛ wa. A wan bɔna a mɛŋa zoore la zuo, ge lebehe bo mam na. 5N gan'arɛ ginhe ge le ihege soŋa. Se'ere n sɔe la, Na'ayenɛ la n gure mam. 6N kan zɔ tuha pia pia wa n kae mam mum zen'an woo te ba zabɛ la mam wa. 7Na'ayenɛ, ihege saazuo Yenɛ, fan' mam. Wɔnrɛ n diŋdoma wa kareyɛɛhe. Kɔ' potɔpa wa nyɛna. 8Faanrɛ ze'ele la Na'ayenɛ la zen'an na. Ho kan' somɔ wan bɔna ho nɛreba zuo.
